16   function defaultInspect(x, _options) {
17       return JSON.stringify(x, (k, v) => {
18           if (typeof v === 'bigint') {
19               return { $numberLong: `${v}` };
20           }
21           else if (isMap(v)) {
22               return Object.fromEntries(v);
23           }
24           return v;
25       });

137  const FIRST_BIT = 0x80;
138  const FIRST_TWO_BITS = 0xc0;
139  const FIRST_THREE_BITS = 0xe0;
140  const FIRST_FOUR_BITS = 0xf0;
141  const FIRST_FIVE_BITS = 0xf8;
142  const TWO_BIT_CHAR = 0xc0;
143  const THREE_BIT_CHAR = 0xe0;
144  const FOUR_BIT_CHAR = 0xf0;
145  const CONTINUING_CHAR = 0x80;
146  function validateUtf8(bytes, start, end) {
147      let continuation = 0;
148      for (let i = start; i < end; i += 1) {
149          const byte = bytes[i];
150          if (continuation) {
151              if ((byte & FIRST_TWO_BITS) !== CONTINUING_CHAR) {
152                  return false;
153              }
154              continuation -= 1;
155          }
156          else if (byte & FIRST_BIT) {
157              if ((byte & FIRST_THREE_BITS) === TWO_BIT_CHAR) {
158                  continuation = 1;
159              }
160              else if ((byte & FIRST_FOUR_BITS) === THREE_BIT_CHAR) {
161                  continuation = 2;
162              }
163              else if ((byte & FIRST_FIVE_BITS) === FOUR_BIT_CHAR) {
164                  continuation = 3;
165              }
166              else {
167                  return false;
168              }
169          }
170      }
171      return !continuation;
172  }
173  
174  function tryReadBasicLatin(uint8array, start, end) {
175      if (uint8array.length === 0) {
176          return '';
177      }
178      const stringByteLength = end - start;
179      if (stringByteLength === 0) {
180          return '';
181      }
182      if (stringByteLength > 20) {
183          return null;
184      }
185      if (stringByteLength === 1 && uint8array[start] < 128) {
186          return String.fromCharCode(uint8array[start]);
187      }
188      if (stringByteLength === 2 && uint8array[start] < 128 && uint8array[start + 1] < 128) {
189          return String.fromCharCode(uint8array[start]) + String.fromCharCode(uint8array[start + 1]);
190      }
191      if (stringByteLength === 3 &&
192          uint8array[start] < 128 &&
193          uint8array[start + 1] < 128 &&
194          uint8array[start + 2] < 128) {
195          return (String.fromCharCode(uint8array[start]) +
196              String.fromCharCode(uint8array[start + 1]) +
197              String.fromCharCode(uint8array[start + 2]));
198      }
199      const latinBytes = [];
200      for (let i = start; i < end; i++) {
201          const byte = uint8array[i];
202          if (byte > 127) {
203              return null;
204          }
205          latinBytes.push(byte);
206      }
207      return String.fromCharCode(...latinBytes);
208  }
209  function tryWriteBasicLatin(destination, source, offset) {
210      if (source.length === 0)
211          return 0;
212      if (source.length > 25)
213          return null;
214      if (destination.length - offset < source.length)
215          return null;
216      for (let charOffset = 0, destinationOffset = offset; charOffset < source.length; charOffset++, destinationOffset++) {
217          const char = source.charCodeAt(charOffset);
218          if (char > 127)
219              return null;
220          destination[destinationOffset] = char;
221      }
222      return source.length;
223  }

225  function nodejsMathRandomBytes(byteLength) {
226      return nodeJsByteUtils.fromNumberArray(Array.from({ length: byteLength }, () => Math.floor(Math.random() * 256)));
227  }
228  const nodejsRandomBytes = await (async () => {
229      try {
230          return (await import('crypto')).randomBytes;
231      }
232      catch {
233          return nodejsMathRandomBytes;
234      }
235  })();
236  const nodeJsByteUtils = {
237      toLocalBufferType(potentialBuffer) {
238          if (Buffer.isBuffer(potentialBuffer)) {
239              return potentialBuffer;
240          }
241          if (ArrayBuffer.isView(potentialBuffer)) {
242              return Buffer.from(potentialBuffer.buffer, potentialBuffer.byteOffset, potentialBuffer.byteLength);
243          }
244          const stringTag = potentialBuffer?.[Symbol.toStringTag] ?? Object.prototype.toString.call(potentialBuffer);
245          if (stringTag === 'ArrayBuffer' ||
246              stringTag === 'SharedArrayBuffer' ||
247              stringTag === '[object ArrayBuffer]' ||
248              stringTag === '[object SharedArrayBuffer]') {
249              return Buffer.from(potentialBuffer);
250          }
251          throw new BSONError(`Cannot create Buffer from ${String(potentialBuffer)}`);
252      },
253      allocate(size) {
254          return Buffer.alloc(size);
255      },
256      allocateUnsafe(size) {
257          return Buffer.allocUnsafe(size);
258      },
259      equals(a, b) {
260          return nodeJsByteUtils.toLocalBufferType(a).equals(b);
261      },
262      fromNumberArray(array) {
263          return Buffer.from(array);
264      },
265      fromBase64(base64) {
266          return Buffer.from(base64, 'base64');
267      },
268      toBase64(buffer) {
269          return nodeJsByteUtils.toLocalBufferType(buffer).toString('base64');
270      },
271      fromISO88591(codePoints) {
272          return Buffer.from(codePoints, 'binary');
273      },
274      toISO88591(buffer) {
275          return nodeJsByteUtils.toLocalBufferType(buffer).toString('binary');
276      },
277      fromHex(hex) {
278          return Buffer.from(hex, 'hex');
279      },
280      toHex(buffer) {
281          return nodeJsByteUtils.toLocalBufferType(buffer).toString('hex');
282      },
283      toUTF8(buffer, start, end, fatal) {
284          const basicLatin = end - start <= 20 ? tryReadBasicLatin(buffer, start, end) : null;
285          if (basicLatin != null) {
286              return basicLatin;
287          }
288          const string = nodeJsByteUtils.toLocalBufferType(buffer).toString('utf8', start, end);
289          if (fatal) {
290              for (let i = 0; i < string.length; i++) {
291                  if (string.charCodeAt(i) === 0xfffd) {
292                      if (!validateUtf8(buffer, start, end)) {
293                          throw new BSONError('Invalid UTF-8 string in BSON document');
294                      }
295                      break;
296                  }
297              }
298          }
299          return string;
300      },
301      utf8ByteLength(input) {
302          return Buffer.byteLength(input, 'utf8');
303      },
304      encodeUTF8Into(buffer, source, byteOffset) {
305          const latinBytesWritten = tryWriteBasicLatin(buffer, source, byteOffset);
306          if (latinBytesWritten != null) {
307              return latinBytesWritten;
308          }
309          return nodeJsByteUtils.toLocalBufferType(buffer).write(source, byteOffset, undefined, 'utf8');
310      },
311      randomBytes: nodejsRandomBytes
312  };

318  function webMathRandomBytes(byteLength) {
319      if (byteLength < 0) {
320          throw new RangeError(`The argument 'byteLength' is invalid. Received ${byteLength}`);
321      }
322      return webByteUtils.fromNumberArray(Array.from({ length: byteLength }, () => Math.floor(Math.random() * 256)));
323  }
324  const webRandomBytes = (() => {
325      const { crypto } = globalThis;
326      if (crypto != null && typeof crypto.getRandomValues === 'function') {
327          return (byteLength) => {
328              return crypto.getRandomValues(webByteUtils.allocate(byteLength));
329          };
330      }
331      else {
332          if (isReactNative()) {
333              const { console } = globalThis;
334              console?.warn?.('BSON: For React Native please polyfill crypto.getRandomValues, e.g. using: https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-native-get-random-values.');
335          }
336          return webMathRandomBytes;
337      }
338  })();
339  const HEX_DIGIT = /(\d|[a-f])/i;
340  const webByteUtils = {
341      toLocalBufferType(potentialUint8array) {
342          const stringTag = potentialUint8array?.[Symbol.toStringTag] ??
343              Object.prototype.toString.call(potentialUint8array);
344          if (stringTag === 'Uint8Array') {
345              return potentialUint8array;
346          }
347          if (ArrayBuffer.isView(potentialUint8array)) {
348              return new Uint8Array(potentialUint8array.buffer.slice(potentialUint8array.byteOffset, potentialUint8array.byteOffset + potentialUint8array.byteLength));
349          }
350          if (stringTag === 'ArrayBuffer' ||
351              stringTag === 'SharedArrayBuffer' ||
352              stringTag === '[object ArrayBuffer]' ||
353              stringTag === '[object SharedArrayBuffer]') {
354              return new Uint8Array(potentialUint8array);
355          }
356          throw new BSONError(`Cannot make a Uint8Array from ${String(potentialUint8array)}`);
357      },
358      allocate(size) {
359          if (typeof size !== 'number') {
360              throw new TypeError(`The "size" argument must be of type number. Received ${String(size)}`);
361          }
362          return new Uint8Array(size);
363      },
364      allocateUnsafe(size) {
365          return webByteUtils.allocate(size);
366      },
367      equals(a, b) {
368          if (a.byteLength !== b.byteLength) {
369              return false;
370          }
371          for (let i = 0; i < a.byteLength; i++) {
372              if (a[i] !== b[i]) {
373                  return false;
374              }
375          }
376          return true;
377      },
378      fromNumberArray(array) {
379          return Uint8Array.from(array);
380      },
381      fromBase64(base64) {
382          return Uint8Array.from(atob(base64), c => c.charCodeAt(0));
383      },
384      toBase64(uint8array) {
385          return btoa(webByteUtils.toISO88591(uint8array));
386      },
387      fromISO88591(codePoints) {
388          return Uint8Array.from(codePoints, c => c.charCodeAt(0) & 0xff);
389      },
390      toISO88591(uint8array) {
391          return Array.from(Uint16Array.from(uint8array), b => String.fromCharCode(b)).join('');
392      },
393      fromHex(hex) {
394          const evenLengthHex = hex.length % 2 === 0 ? hex : hex.slice(0, hex.length - 1);
395          const buffer = [];
396          for (let i = 0; i < evenLengthHex.length; i += 2) {
397              const firstDigit = evenLengthHex[i];
398              const secondDigit = evenLengthHex[i + 1];
399              if (!HEX_DIGIT.test(firstDigit)) {
400                  break;
401              }
402              if (!HEX_DIGIT.test(secondDigit)) {
403                  break;
404              }
405              const hexDigit = Number.parseInt(`${firstDigit}${secondDigit}`, 16);
406              buffer.push(hexDigit);
407          }
408          return Uint8Array.from(buffer);
409      },
410      toHex(uint8array) {
411          return Array.from(uint8array, byte => byte.toString(16).padStart(2, '0')).join('');
412      },
413      toUTF8(uint8array, start, end, fatal) {
414          const basicLatin = end - start <= 20 ? tryReadBasicLatin(uint8array, start, end) : null;
415          if (basicLatin != null) {
416              return basicLatin;
417          }
418          if (fatal) {
419              try {
420                  return new TextDecoder('utf8', { fatal }).decode(uint8array.slice(start, end));
421              }
422              catch (cause) {
423                  throw new BSONError('Invalid UTF-8 string in BSON document', { cause });
424              }
425          }
426          return new TextDecoder('utf8', { fatal }).decode(uint8array.slice(start, end));
427      },
428      utf8ByteLength(input) {
429          return new TextEncoder().encode(input).byteLength;
430      },
431      encodeUTF8Into(uint8array, source, byteOffset) {
432          const bytes = new TextEncoder().encode(source);
433          uint8array.set(bytes, byteOffset);
434          return bytes.byteLength;
435      },
436      randomBytes: webRandomBytes
437  };

439  const hasGlobalBuffer = typeof Buffer === 'function' && Buffer.prototype?._isBuffer !== true;
440  const ByteUtils = hasGlobalBuffer ? nodeJsByteUtils : webByteUtils;

442  class BSONValue {
443      get [Symbol.for('@@mdb.bson.version')]() {
444          return BSON_MAJOR_VERSION;
445      }
446      [Symbol.for('nodejs.util.inspect.custom')](depth, options, inspect) {
447          return this.inspect(depth, options, inspect);
448      }
449  }
450  
451  class Binary extends BSONValue {
452      get _bsontype() {
453          return 'Binary';
454      }
455      constructor(buffer, subType) {
456          super();
457          if (!(buffer == null) &&
458              typeof buffer === 'string' &&
459              !ArrayBuffer.isView(buffer) &&
460              !isAnyArrayBuffer(buffer) &&
461              !Array.isArray(buffer)) {
462              throw new BSONError('Binary can only be constructed from Uint8Array or number[]');
463          }
464          this.sub_type = subType ?? Binary.BSON_BINARY_SUBTYPE_DEFAULT;
465          if (buffer == null) {
466              this.buffer = ByteUtils.allocate(Binary.BUFFER_SIZE);
467              this.position = 0;
468          }
469          else {
470              this.buffer = Array.isArray(buffer)
471                  ? ByteUtils.fromNumberArray(buffer)
472                  : ByteUtils.toLocalBufferType(buffer);
473              this.position = this.buffer.byteLength;
474          }
475      }
476      put(byteValue) {
477          if (typeof byteValue === 'string' && byteValue.length !== 1) {
478              throw new BSONError('only accepts single character String');
479          }
480          else if (typeof byteValue !== 'number' && byteValue.length !== 1)
481              throw new BSONError('only accepts single character Uint8Array or Array');
482          let decodedByte;
483          if (typeof byteValue === 'string') {
484              decodedByte = byteValue.charCodeAt(0);
485          }
486          else if (typeof byteValue === 'number') {
487              decodedByte = byteValue;
488          }
489          else {
490              decodedByte = byteValue[0];
491          }
492          if (decodedByte < 0 || decodedByte > 255) {
493              throw new BSONError('only accepts number in a valid unsigned byte range 0-255');
494          }
495          if (this.buffer.byteLength > this.position) {
496              this.buffer[this.position++] = decodedByte;
497          }
498          else {
499              const newSpace = ByteUtils.allocate(Binary.BUFFER_SIZE + this.buffer.length);
500              newSpace.set(this.buffer, 0);
501              this.buffer = newSpace;
502              this.buffer[this.position++] = decodedByte;
503          }
504      }
505      write(sequence, offset) {
506          offset = typeof offset === 'number' ? offset : this.position;
507          if (this.buffer.byteLength < offset + sequence.length) {
508              const newSpace = ByteUtils.allocate(this.buffer.byteLength + sequence.length);
509              newSpace.set(this.buffer, 0);
510              this.buffer = newSpace;
511          }
512          if (ArrayBuffer.isView(sequence)) {
513              this.buffer.set(ByteUtils.toLocalBufferType(sequence), offset);
514              this.position =
515                  offset + sequence.byteLength > this.position ? offset + sequence.length : this.position;
516          }
517          else if (typeof sequence === 'string') {
518              throw new BSONError('input cannot be string');
519          }
520      }
521      read(position, length) {
522          length = length && length > 0 ? length : this.position;
523          return this.buffer.slice(position, position + length);
524      }
525      value() {
526          return this.buffer.length === this.position
527              ? this.buffer
528              : this.buffer.subarray(0, this.position);
529      }
530      length() {
531          return this.position;
532      }
533      toJSON() {
534          return ByteUtils.toBase64(this.buffer);
535      }
536      toString(encoding) {
537          if (encoding === 'hex')
538              return ByteUtils.toHex(this.buffer);
539          if (encoding === 'base64')
540              return ByteUtils.toBase64(this.buffer);
541          if (encoding === 'utf8' || encoding === 'utf-8')
542              return ByteUtils.toUTF8(this.buffer, 0, this.buffer.byteLength, false);
543          return ByteUtils.toUTF8(this.buffer, 0, this.buffer.byteLength, false);
544      }
545      toExtendedJSON(options) {
546          options = options || {};
547          const base64String = ByteUtils.toBase64(this.buffer);
548          const subType = Number(this.sub_type).toString(16);
549          if (options.legacy) {
550              return {
551                  $binary: base64String,
552                  $type: subType.length === 1 ? '0' + subType : subType
553              };
554          }
555          return {
556              $binary: {
557                  base64: base64String,
558                  subType: subType.length === 1 ? '0' + subType : subType
559              }
560          };
561      }
562      toUUID() {
563          if (this.sub_type === Binary.SUBTYPE_UUID) {
564              return new UUID(this.buffer.slice(0, this.position));
565          }
566          throw new BSONError(`Binary sub_type "${this.sub_type}" is not supported for converting to UUID. Only "${Binary.SUBTYPE_UUID}" is currently supported.`);
567      }
568      static createFromHexString(hex, subType) {
569          return new Binary(ByteUtils.fromHex(hex), subType);
570      }
571      static createFromBase64(base64, subType) {
572          return new Binary(ByteUtils.fromBase64(base64), subType);
573      }
574      static fromExtendedJSON(doc, options) {
575          options = options || {};
576          let data;
577          let type;
578          if ('$binary' in doc) {
579              if (options.legacy && typeof doc.$binary === 'string' && '$type' in doc) {
580                  type = doc.$type ? parseInt(doc.$type, 16) : 0;
581                  data = ByteUtils.fromBase64(doc.$binary);
582              }
583              else {
584                  if (typeof doc.$binary !== 'string') {
585                      type = doc.$binary.subType ? parseInt(doc.$binary.subType, 16) : 0;
586                      data = ByteUtils.fromBase64(doc.$binary.base64);
587                  }
588              }
589          }
590          else if ('$uuid' in doc) {
591              type = 4;
592              data = UUID.bytesFromString(doc.$uuid);
593          }
594          if (!data) {
595              throw new BSONError(`Unexpected Binary Extended JSON format ${JSON.stringify(doc)}`);
596          }
597          return type === BSON_BINARY_SUBTYPE_UUID_NEW ? new UUID(data) : new Binary(data, type);
598      }
599      inspect(depth, options, inspect) {
600          inspect ??= defaultInspect;
601          const base64 = ByteUtils.toBase64(this.buffer.subarray(0, this.position));
602          const base64Arg = inspect(base64, options);
603          const subTypeArg = inspect(this.sub_type, options);
604          return `Binary.createFromBase64(${base64Arg}, ${subTypeArg})`;
605      }
606  }
607  Binary.BSON_BINARY_SUBTYPE_DEFAULT = 0;
608  Binary.BUFFER_SIZE = 256;
609  Binary.SUBTYPE_DEFAULT = 0;
610  Binary.SUBTYPE_FUNCTION = 1;
611  Binary.SUBTYPE_BYTE_ARRAY = 2;
612  Binary.SUBTYPE_UUID_OLD = 3;
613  Binary.SUBTYPE_UUID = 4;
614  Binary.SUBTYPE_MD5 = 5;
615  Binary.SUBTYPE_ENCRYPTED = 6;
616  Binary.SUBTYPE_COLUMN = 7;
617  Binary.SUBTYPE_SENSITIVE = 8;
618  Binary.SUBTYPE_USER_DEFINED = 128;
619  const UUID_BYTE_LENGTH = 16;
620  const UUID_WITHOUT_DASHES = /^[0-9A-F]{32}$/i;
621  const UUID_WITH_DASHES = /^[0-9A-F]{8}-[0-9A-F]{4}-[0-9A-F]{4}-[0-9A-F]{4}-[0-9A-F]{12}$/i;
622  class UUID extends Binary {
623      constructor(input) {
624          let bytes;
625          if (input == null) {
626              bytes = UUID.generate();
627          }
628          else if (input instanceof UUID) {
629              bytes = ByteUtils.toLocalBufferType(new Uint8Array(input.buffer));
630          }
631          else if (ArrayBuffer.isView(input) && input.byteLength === UUID_BYTE_LENGTH) {
632              bytes = ByteUtils.toLocalBufferType(input);
633          }
634          else if (typeof input === 'string') {
635              bytes = UUID.bytesFromString(input);
636          }
637          else {
638              throw new BSONError('Argument passed in UUID constructor must be a UUID, a 16 byte Buffer or a 32/36 character hex string (dashes excluded/included, format: xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx).');
639          }
640          super(bytes, BSON_BINARY_SUBTYPE_UUID_NEW);
641      }
642      get id() {
643          return this.buffer;
644      }
645      set id(value) {
646          this.buffer = value;
647      }
648      toHexString(includeDashes = true) {
649          if (includeDashes) {
650              return [
651                  ByteUtils.toHex(this.buffer.subarray(0, 4)),
652                  ByteUtils.toHex(this.buffer.subarray(4, 6)),
653                  ByteUtils.toHex(this.buffer.subarray(6, 8)),
654                  ByteUtils.toHex(this.buffer.subarray(8, 10)),
655                  ByteUtils.toHex(this.buffer.subarray(10, 16))
656              ].join('-');
657          }
658          return ByteUtils.toHex(this.buffer);
659      }
660      toString(encoding) {
661          if (encoding === 'hex')
662              return ByteUtils.toHex(this.id);
663          if (encoding === 'base64')
664              return ByteUtils.toBase64(this.id);
665          return this.toHexString();
666      }
667      toJSON() {
668          return this.toHexString();
669      }
670      equals(otherId) {
671          if (!otherId) {
672              return false;
673          }
674          if (otherId instanceof UUID) {
675              return ByteUtils.equals(otherId.id, this.id);
676          }
677          try {
678              return ByteUtils.equals(new UUID(otherId).id, this.id);
679          }
680          catch {
681              return false;
682          }
683      }
684      toBinary() {
685          return new Binary(this.id, Binary.SUBTYPE_UUID);
686      }
687      static generate() {
688          const bytes = ByteUtils.randomBytes(UUID_BYTE_LENGTH);
689          bytes[6] = (bytes[6] & 0x0f) | 0x40;
690          bytes[8] = (bytes[8] & 0x3f) | 0x80;
691          return bytes;
692      }
693      static isValid(input) {
694          if (!input) {
695              return false;
696          }
697          if (typeof input === 'string') {
698              return UUID.isValidUUIDString(input);
699          }
700          if (isUint8Array(input)) {
701              return input.byteLength === UUID_BYTE_LENGTH;
702          }
703          return (input._bsontype === 'Binary' &&
704              input.sub_type === this.SUBTYPE_UUID &&
705              input.buffer.byteLength === 16);
706      }
707      static createFromHexString(hexString) {
708          const buffer = UUID.bytesFromString(hexString);
709          return new UUID(buffer);
710      }
711      static createFromBase64(base64) {
712          return new UUID(ByteUtils.fromBase64(base64));
713      }
714      static bytesFromString(representation) {
715          if (!UUID.isValidUUIDString(representation)) {
716              throw new BSONError('UUID string representation must be 32 hex digits or canonical hyphenated representation');
717          }
718          return ByteUtils.fromHex(representation.replace(/-/g, ''));
719      }
720      static isValidUUIDString(representation) {
721          return UUID_WITHOUT_DASHES.test(representation) || UUID_WITH_DASHES.test(representation);
722      }
723      inspect(depth, options, inspect) {
724          inspect ??= defaultInspect;
725          return `new UUID(${inspect(this.toHexString(), options)})`;
726      }
727  }

745          if (this.scope) {
746              return { $code: this.code, $scope: this.scope };
747          }

759          }

761          return `new Code(${multiLineFn ? '\n' : ''}${parametersString}${endingNewline ? '\n' : ''})`;

765  function isDBRefLike(value) {
766      return (value != null &&
767          typeof value === 'object' &&
768          '$id' in value &&
769          value.$id != null &&
770          '$ref' in value &&
771          typeof value.$ref === 'string' &&
772          (!('$db' in value) || ('$db' in value && typeof value.$db === 'string')));

774  class DBRef extends BSONValue {
775      get _bsontype() {
776          return 'DBRef';
777      }
778      constructor(collection, oid, db, fields) {
779          super();
780          const parts = collection.split('.');
781          if (parts.length === 2) {
782              db = parts.shift();
783              collection = parts.shift();
784          }
785          this.collection = collection;
786          this.oid = oid;
787          this.db = db;
788          this.fields = fields || {};
789      }
790      get namespace() {
791          return this.collection;
792      }
793      set namespace(value) {
794          this.collection = value;
795      }
796      toJSON() {
797          const o = Object.assign({
798              $ref: this.collection,
799              $id: this.oid
800          }, this.fields);
801          if (this.db != null)
802              o.$db = this.db;
803          return o;
804      }
805      toExtendedJSON(options) {
806          options = options || {};
807          let o = {
808              $ref: this.collection,
809              $id: this.oid
810          };
811          if (options.legacy) {
812              return o;
813          }
814          if (this.db)
815              o.$db = this.db;
816          o = Object.assign(o, this.fields);
817          return o;
818      }
819      static fromExtendedJSON(doc) {
820          const copy = Object.assign({}, doc);
821          delete copy.$ref;
822          delete copy.$id;
823          delete copy.$db;
824          return new DBRef(doc.$ref, doc.$id, doc.$db, copy);
825      }
826      inspect(depth, options, inspect) {
827          inspect ??= defaultInspect;
828          const args = [
829              inspect(this.namespace, options),
830              inspect(this.oid, options),
831              ...(this.db ? [inspect(this.db, options)] : []),
832              ...(Object.keys(this.fields).length > 0 ? [inspect(this.fields, options)] : [])
833          ];
834          args[1] = inspect === defaultInspect ? `new ObjectId(${args[1]})` : args[1];
835          return `new DBRef(${args.join(', ')})`;
836      }

845  const TWO_PWR_16_DBL = 1 << 16;
846  const TWO_PWR_24_DBL = 1 << 24;
847  const TWO_PWR_32_DBL = TWO_PWR_16_DBL * TWO_PWR_16_DBL;
848  const TWO_PWR_64_DBL = TWO_PWR_32_DBL * TWO_PWR_32_DBL;
849  const TWO_PWR_63_DBL = TWO_PWR_64_DBL / 2;
850  const INT_CACHE = {};
851  const UINT_CACHE = {};
852  const MAX_INT64_STRING_LENGTH = 20;
853  const DECIMAL_REG_EX = /^(\+?0|(\+|-)?[1-9][0-9]*)$/;
854  class Long extends BSONValue {
855      get _bsontype() {
856          return 'Long';
857      }
858      get __isLong__() {
859          return true;
860      }
861      constructor(low = 0, high, unsigned) {
862          super();
863          if (typeof low === 'bigint') {
864              Object.assign(this, Long.fromBigInt(low, !!high));
865          }
866          else if (typeof low === 'string') {
867              Object.assign(this, Long.fromString(low, !!high));
868          }
869          else {
870              this.low = low | 0;
871              this.high = high | 0;
872              this.unsigned = !!unsigned;
873          }
874      }
875      static fromBits(lowBits, highBits, unsigned) {
876          return new Long(lowBits, highBits, unsigned);
877      }
878      static fromInt(value, unsigned) {
879          let obj, cachedObj, cache;
880          if (unsigned) {
881              value >>>= 0;
882              if ((cache = 0 <= value && value < 256)) {
883                  cachedObj = UINT_CACHE[value];
884                  if (cachedObj)
885                      return cachedObj;
886              }
887              obj = Long.fromBits(value, (value | 0) < 0 ? -1 : 0, true);
888              if (cache)
889                  UINT_CACHE[value] = obj;
890              return obj;
891          }
892          else {
893              value |= 0;
894              if ((cache = -128 <= value && value < 128)) {
895                  cachedObj = INT_CACHE[value];
896                  if (cachedObj)
897                      return cachedObj;
898              }
899              obj = Long.fromBits(value, value < 0 ? -1 : 0, false);
900              if (cache)
901                  INT_CACHE[value] = obj;
902              return obj;
903          }
904      }
905      static fromNumber(value, unsigned) {
906          if (isNaN(value))
907              return unsigned ? Long.UZERO : Long.ZERO;
908          if (unsigned) {
909              if (value < 0)
910                  return Long.UZERO;
911              if (value >= TWO_PWR_64_DBL)
912                  return Long.MAX_UNSIGNED_VALUE;
913          }
914          else {
915              if (value <= -TWO_PWR_63_DBL)
916                  return Long.MIN_VALUE;
917              if (value + 1 >= TWO_PWR_63_DBL)
918                  return Long.MAX_VALUE;
919          }
920          if (value < 0)
921              return Long.fromNumber(-value, unsigned).neg();
922          return Long.fromBits(value % TWO_PWR_32_DBL | 0, (value / TWO_PWR_32_DBL) | 0, unsigned);
923      }
924      static fromBigInt(value, unsigned) {
925          return Long.fromString(value.toString(), unsigned);
926      }
927      static fromString(str, unsigned, radix) {
928          if (str.length === 0)
929              throw new BSONError('empty string');
930          if (str === 'NaN' || str === 'Infinity' || str === '+Infinity' || str === '-Infinity')
931              return Long.ZERO;
932          if (typeof unsigned === 'number') {
933              (radix = unsigned), (unsigned = false);
934          }
935          else {
936              unsigned = !!unsigned;
937          }
938          radix = radix || 10;
939          if (radix < 2 || 36 < radix)
940              throw new BSONError('radix');
941          let p;
942          if ((p = str.indexOf('-')) > 0)
943              throw new BSONError('interior hyphen');
944          else if (p === 0) {
945              return Long.fromString(str.substring(1), unsigned, radix).neg();
946          }
947          const radixToPower = Long.fromNumber(Math.pow(radix, 8));
948          let result = Long.ZERO;
949          for (let i = 0; i < str.length; i += 8) {
950              const size = Math.min(8, str.length - i), value = parseInt(str.substring(i, i + size), radix);
951              if (size < 8) {
952                  const power = Long.fromNumber(Math.pow(radix, size));
953                  result = result.mul(power).add(Long.fromNumber(value));
954              }
955              else {
956                  result = result.mul(radixToPower);
957                  result = result.add(Long.fromNumber(value));
958              }
959          }
960          result.unsigned = unsigned;
961          return result;
962      }
963      static fromBytes(bytes, unsigned, le) {
964          return le ? Long.fromBytesLE(bytes, unsigned) : Long.fromBytesBE(bytes, unsigned);
965      }
966      static fromBytesLE(bytes, unsigned) {
967          return new Long(bytes[0] | (bytes[1] << 8) | (bytes[2] << 16) | (bytes[3] << 24), bytes[4] | (bytes[5] << 8) | (bytes[6] << 16) | (bytes[7] << 24), unsigned);
968      }
969      static fromBytesBE(bytes, unsigned) {
970          return new Long((bytes[4] << 24) | (bytes[5] << 16) | (bytes[6] << 8) | bytes[7], (bytes[0] << 24) | (bytes[1] << 16) | (bytes[2] << 8) | bytes[3], unsigned);
971      }
972      static isLong(value) {
973          return (value != null &&
974              typeof value === 'object' &&
975              '__isLong__' in value &&
976              value.__isLong__ === true);
977      }
978      static fromValue(val, unsigned) {
979          if (typeof val === 'number')
980              return Long.fromNumber(val, unsigned);
981          if (typeof val === 'string')
982              return Long.fromString(val, unsigned);
983          return Long.fromBits(val.low, val.high, typeof unsigned === 'boolean' ? unsigned : val.unsigned);
984      }
985      add(addend) {
986          if (!Long.isLong(addend))
987              addend = Long.fromValue(addend);
988          const a48 = this.high >>> 16;
989          const a32 = this.high & 0xffff;
990          const a16 = this.low >>> 16;
991          const a00 = this.low & 0xffff;
992          const b48 = addend.high >>> 16;
993          const b32 = addend.high & 0xffff;
994          const b16 = addend.low >>> 16;
995          const b00 = addend.low & 0xffff;
996          let c48 = 0, c32 = 0, c16 = 0, c00 = 0;
997          c00 += a00 + b00;
998          c16 += c00 >>> 16;
999          c00 &= 0xffff;
1000         c16 += a16 + b16;
1001         c32 += c16 >>> 16;
1002         c16 &= 0xffff;
1003         c32 += a32 + b32;
1004         c48 += c32 >>> 16;
1005         c32 &= 0xffff;
1006         c48 += a48 + b48;
1007         c48 &= 0xffff;
1008         return Long.fromBits((c16 << 16) | c00, (c48 << 16) | c32, this.unsigned);
1009     }
1010     and(other) {
1011         if (!Long.isLong(other))
1012             other = Long.fromValue(other);
1013         return Long.fromBits(this.low & other.low, this.high & other.high, this.unsigned);
1014     }
1015     compare(other) {
1016         if (!Long.isLong(other))
1017             other = Long.fromValue(other);
1018         if (this.eq(other))
1019             return 0;
1020         const thisNeg = this.isNegative(), otherNeg = other.isNegative();
1021         if (thisNeg && !otherNeg)
1022             return -1;
1023         if (!thisNeg && otherNeg)
1024             return 1;
1025         if (!this.unsigned)
1026             return this.sub(other).isNegative() ? -1 : 1;
1027         return other.high >>> 0 > this.high >>> 0 ||
1028             (other.high === this.high && other.low >>> 0 > this.low >>> 0)
1029             ? -1
1030             : 1;
1031     }
1032     comp(other) {
1033         return this.compare(other);
1034     }
1035     divide(divisor) {
1036         if (!Long.isLong(divisor))
1037             divisor = Long.fromValue(divisor);
1038         if (divisor.isZero())
1039             throw new BSONError('division by zero');
1040         if (wasm) {
1041             if (!this.unsigned &&
1042                 this.high === -0x80000000 &&
1043                 divisor.low === -1 &&
1044                 divisor.high === -1) {
1045                 return this;
1046             }
1047             const low = (this.unsigned ? wasm.div_u : wasm.div_s)(this.low, this.high, divisor.low, divisor.high);
1048             return Long.fromBits(low, wasm.get_high(), this.unsigned);
1049         }
1050         if (this.isZero())
1051             return this.unsigned ? Long.UZERO : Long.ZERO;
1052         let approx, rem, res;
1053         if (!this.unsigned) {
1054             if (this.eq(Long.MIN_VALUE)) {
1055                 if (divisor.eq(Long.ONE) || divisor.eq(Long.NEG_ONE))
1056                     return Long.MIN_VALUE;
1057                 else if (divisor.eq(Long.MIN_VALUE))
1058                     return Long.ONE;
1059                 else {
1060                     const halfThis = this.shr(1);
1061                     approx = halfThis.div(divisor).shl(1);
1062                     if (approx.eq(Long.ZERO)) {
1063                         return divisor.isNegative() ? Long.ONE : Long.NEG_ONE;
1064                     }
1065                     else {
1066                         rem = this.sub(divisor.mul(approx));
1067                         res = approx.add(rem.div(divisor));
1068                         return res;
1069                     }
1070                 }
1071             }
1072             else if (divisor.eq(Long.MIN_VALUE))
1073                 return this.unsigned ? Long.UZERO : Long.ZERO;
1074             if (this.isNegative()) {
1075                 if (divisor.isNegative())
1076                     return this.neg().div(divisor.neg());
1077                 return this.neg().div(divisor).neg();
1078             }
1079             else if (divisor.isNegative())
1080                 return this.div(divisor.neg()).neg();
1081             res = Long.ZERO;
1082         }
1083         else {
1084             if (!divisor.unsigned)
1085                 divisor = divisor.toUnsigned();
1086             if (divisor.gt(this))
1087                 return Long.UZERO;
1088             if (divisor.gt(this.shru(1)))
1089                 return Long.UONE;
1090             res = Long.UZERO;
1091         }
1092         rem = this;
1093         while (rem.gte(divisor)) {
1094             approx = Math.max(1, Math.floor(rem.toNumber() / divisor.toNumber()));
1095             const log2 = Math.ceil(Math.log(approx) / Math.LN2);
1096             const delta = log2 <= 48 ? 1 : Math.pow(2, log2 - 48);
1097             let approxRes = Long.fromNumber(approx);
1098             let approxRem = approxRes.mul(divisor);
1099             while (approxRem.isNegative() || approxRem.gt(rem)) {
1100                 approx -= delta;
1101                 approxRes = Long.fromNumber(approx, this.unsigned);
1102                 approxRem = approxRes.mul(divisor);
1103             }
1104             if (approxRes.isZero())
1105                 approxRes = Long.ONE;
1106             res = res.add(approxRes);
1107             rem = rem.sub(approxRem);
1108         }
1109         return res;
1110     }
1111     div(divisor) {
1112         return this.divide(divisor);
1113     }
1114     equals(other) {
1115         if (!Long.isLong(other))
1116             other = Long.fromValue(other);
1117         if (this.unsigned !== other.unsigned && this.high >>> 31 === 1 && other.high >>> 31 === 1)
1118             return false;
1119         return this.high === other.high && this.low === other.low;
1120     }
1121     eq(other) {
1122         return this.equals(other);
1123     }
1124     getHighBits() {
1125         return this.high;
1126     }
1127     getHighBitsUnsigned() {
1128         return this.high >>> 0;
1129     }
1130     getLowBits() {
1131         return this.low;
1132     }
1133     getLowBitsUnsigned() {
1134         return this.low >>> 0;
1135     }
1136     getNumBitsAbs() {
1137         if (this.isNegative()) {
1138             return this.eq(Long.MIN_VALUE) ? 64 : this.neg().getNumBitsAbs();
1139         }
1140         const val = this.high !== 0 ? this.high : this.low;
1141         let bit;
1142         for (bit = 31; bit > 0; bit--)
1143             if ((val & (1 << bit)) !== 0)
1144                 break;
1145         return this.high !== 0 ? bit + 33 : bit + 1;
1146     }
1147     greaterThan(other) {
1148         return this.comp(other) > 0;
1149     }
1150     gt(other) {
1151         return this.greaterThan(other);
1152     }
1153     greaterThanOrEqual(other) {
1154         return this.comp(other) >= 0;
1155     }
1156     gte(other) {
1157         return this.greaterThanOrEqual(other);
1158     }
1159     ge(other) {
1160         return this.greaterThanOrEqual(other);
1161     }
1162     isEven() {
1163         return (this.low & 1) === 0;
1164     }
1165     isNegative() {
1166         return !this.unsigned && this.high < 0;
1167     }
1168     isOdd() {
1169         return (this.low & 1) === 1;
1170     }
1171     isPositive() {
1172         return this.unsigned || this.high >= 0;
1173     }
1174     isZero() {
1175         return this.high === 0 && this.low === 0;
1176     }
1177     lessThan(other) {
1178         return this.comp(other) < 0;
1179     }
1180     lt(other) {
1181         return this.lessThan(other);
1182     }
1183     lessThanOrEqual(other) {
1184         return this.comp(other) <= 0;
1185     }
1186     lte(other) {
1187         return this.lessThanOrEqual(other);
1188     }
1189     modulo(divisor) {
1190         if (!Long.isLong(divisor))
1191             divisor = Long.fromValue(divisor);
1192         if (wasm) {
1193             const low = (this.unsigned ? wasm.rem_u : wasm.rem_s)(this.low, this.high, divisor.low, divisor.high);
1194             return Long.fromBits(low, wasm.get_high(), this.unsigned);
1195         }
1196         return this.sub(this.div(divisor).mul(divisor));
1197     }
1198     mod(divisor) {
1199         return this.modulo(divisor);
1200     }
1201     rem(divisor) {
1202         return this.modulo(divisor);
1203     }
1204     multiply(multiplier) {
1205         if (this.isZero())
1206             return Long.ZERO;
1207         if (!Long.isLong(multiplier))
1208             multiplier = Long.fromValue(multiplier);
1209         if (wasm) {
1210             const low = wasm.mul(this.low, this.high, multiplier.low, multiplier.high);
1211             return Long.fromBits(low, wasm.get_high(), this.unsigned);
1212         }
1213         if (multiplier.isZero())
1214             return Long.ZERO;
1215         if (this.eq(Long.MIN_VALUE))
1216             return multiplier.isOdd() ? Long.MIN_VALUE : Long.ZERO;
1217         if (multiplier.eq(Long.MIN_VALUE))
1218             return this.isOdd() ? Long.MIN_VALUE : Long.ZERO;
1219         if (this.isNegative()) {
1220             if (multiplier.isNegative())
1221                 return this.neg().mul(multiplier.neg());
1222             else
1223                 return this.neg().mul(multiplier).neg();
1224         }
1225         else if (multiplier.isNegative())
1226             return this.mul(multiplier.neg()).neg();
1227         if (this.lt(Long.TWO_PWR_24) && multiplier.lt(Long.TWO_PWR_24))
1228             return Long.fromNumber(this.toNumber() * multiplier.toNumber(), this.unsigned);
1229         const a48 = this.high >>> 16;
1230         const a32 = this.high & 0xffff;
1231         const a16 = this.low >>> 16;
1232         const a00 = this.low & 0xffff;
1233         const b48 = multiplier.high >>> 16;
1234         const b32 = multiplier.high & 0xffff;
1235         const b16 = multiplier.low >>> 16;
1236         const b00 = multiplier.low & 0xffff;
1237         let c48 = 0, c32 = 0, c16 = 0, c00 = 0;
1238         c00 += a00 * b00;
1239         c16 += c00 >>> 16;
1240         c00 &= 0xffff;
1241         c16 += a16 * b00;
1242         c32 += c16 >>> 16;
1243         c16 &= 0xffff;
1244         c16 += a00 * b16;
1245         c32 += c16 >>> 16;
1246         c16 &= 0xffff;
1247         c32 += a32 * b00;
1248         c48 += c32 >>> 16;
1249         c32 &= 0xffff;
1250         c32 += a16 * b16;
1251         c48 += c32 >>> 16;
1252         c32 &= 0xffff;
1253         c32 += a00 * b32;
1254         c48 += c32 >>> 16;
1255         c32 &= 0xffff;
1256         c48 += a48 * b00 + a32 * b16 + a16 * b32 + a00 * b48;
1257         c48 &= 0xffff;
1258         return Long.fromBits((c16 << 16) | c00, (c48 << 16) | c32, this.unsigned);
1259     }
1260     mul(multiplier) {
1261         return this.multiply(multiplier);
1262     }
1263     negate() {
1264         if (!this.unsigned && this.eq(Long.MIN_VALUE))
1265             return Long.MIN_VALUE;
1266         return this.not().add(Long.ONE);
1267     }
1268     neg() {
1269         return this.negate();
1270     }
1271     not() {
1272         return Long.fromBits(~this.low, ~this.high, this.unsigned);
1273     }
1274     notEquals(other) {
1275         return !this.equals(other);
1276     }
1277     neq(other) {
1278         return this.notEquals(other);
1279     }
1280     ne(other) {
1281         return this.notEquals(other);
1282     }
1283     or(other) {
1284         if (!Long.isLong(other))
1285             other = Long.fromValue(other);
1286         return Long.fromBits(this.low | other.low, this.high | other.high, this.unsigned);
1287     }
1288     shiftLeft(numBits) {
1289         if (Long.isLong(numBits))
1290             numBits = numBits.toInt();
1291         if ((numBits &= 63) === 0)
1292             return this;
1293         else if (numBits < 32)
1294             return Long.fromBits(this.low << numBits, (this.high << numBits) | (this.low >>> (32 - numBits)), this.unsigned);
1295         else
1296             return Long.fromBits(0, this.low << (numBits - 32), this.unsigned);
1297     }
1298     shl(numBits) {
1299         return this.shiftLeft(numBits);
1300     }
1301     shiftRight(numBits) {
1302         if (Long.isLong(numBits))
1303             numBits = numBits.toInt();
1304         if ((numBits &= 63) === 0)
1305             return this;
1306         else if (numBits < 32)
1307             return Long.fromBits((this.low >>> numBits) | (this.high << (32 - numBits)), this.high >> numBits, this.unsigned);
1308         else
1309             return Long.fromBits(this.high >> (numBits - 32), this.high >= 0 ? 0 : -1, this.unsigned);
1310     }
1311     shr(numBits) {
1312         return this.shiftRight(numBits);
1313     }
1314     shiftRightUnsigned(numBits) {
1315         if (Long.isLong(numBits))
1316             numBits = numBits.toInt();
1317         numBits &= 63;
1318         if (numBits === 0)
1319             return this;
1320         else {
1321             const high = this.high;
1322             if (numBits < 32) {
1323                 const low = this.low;
1324                 return Long.fromBits((low >>> numBits) | (high << (32 - numBits)), high >>> numBits, this.unsigned);
1325             }
1326             else if (numBits === 32)
1327                 return Long.fromBits(high, 0, this.unsigned);
1328             else
1329                 return Long.fromBits(high >>> (numBits - 32), 0, this.unsigned);
1330         }
1331     }
1332     shr_u(numBits) {
1333         return this.shiftRightUnsigned(numBits);
1334     }
1335     shru(numBits) {
1336         return this.shiftRightUnsigned(numBits);
1337     }
1338     subtract(subtrahend) {
1339         if (!Long.isLong(subtrahend))
1340             subtrahend = Long.fromValue(subtrahend);
1341         return this.add(subtrahend.neg());
1342     }
1343     sub(subtrahend) {
1344         return this.subtract(subtrahend);
1345     }
1346     toInt() {
1347         return this.unsigned ? this.low >>> 0 : this.low;
1348     }
1349     toNumber() {
1350         if (this.unsigned)
1351             return (this.high >>> 0) * TWO_PWR_32_DBL + (this.low >>> 0);
1352         return this.high * TWO_PWR_32_DBL + (this.low >>> 0);
1353     }
1354     toBigInt() {
1355         return BigInt(this.toString());
1356     }
1357     toBytes(le) {
1358         return le ? this.toBytesLE() : this.toBytesBE();
1359     }
1360     toBytesLE() {
1361         const hi = this.high, lo = this.low;
1362         return [
1363             lo & 0xff,
1364             (lo >>> 8) & 0xff,
1365             (lo >>> 16) & 0xff,
1366             lo >>> 24,
1367             hi & 0xff,
1368             (hi >>> 8) & 0xff,
1369             (hi >>> 16) & 0xff,
1370             hi >>> 24
1371         ];
1372     }
1373     toBytesBE() {
1374         const hi = this.high, lo = this.low;
1375         return [
1376             hi >>> 24,
1377             (hi >>> 16) & 0xff,
1378             (hi >>> 8) & 0xff,
1379             hi & 0xff,
1380             lo >>> 24,
1381             (lo >>> 16) & 0xff,
1382             (lo >>> 8) & 0xff,
1383             lo & 0xff
1384         ];
1385     }
1386     toSigned() {
1387         if (!this.unsigned)
1388             return this;
1389         return Long.fromBits(this.low, this.high, false);
1390     }
1391     toString(radix) {
1392         radix = radix || 10;
1393         if (radix < 2 || 36 < radix)
1394             throw new BSONError('radix');
1395         if (this.isZero())
1396             return '0';
1397         if (this.isNegative()) {
1398             if (this.eq(Long.MIN_VALUE)) {
1399                 const radixLong = Long.fromNumber(radix), div = this.div(radixLong), rem1 = div.mul(radixLong).sub(this);
1400                 return div.toString(radix) + rem1.toInt().toString(radix);
1401             }
1402             else
1403                 return '-' + this.neg().toString(radix);
1404         }
1405         const radixToPower = Long.fromNumber(Math.pow(radix, 6), this.unsigned);
1406         let rem = this;
1407         let result = '';
1408         while (true) {
1409             const remDiv = rem.div(radixToPower);
1410             const intval = rem.sub(remDiv.mul(radixToPower)).toInt() >>> 0;
1411             let digits = intval.toString(radix);
1412             rem = remDiv;
1413             if (rem.isZero()) {
1414                 return digits + result;
1415             }
1416             else {
1417                 while (digits.length < 6)
1418                     digits = '0' + digits;
1419                 result = '' + digits + result;
1420             }
1421         }
1422     }
1423     toUnsigned() {
1424         if (this.unsigned)
1425             return this;
1426         return Long.fromBits(this.low, this.high, true);
1427     }
1428     xor(other) {
1429         if (!Long.isLong(other))
1430             other = Long.fromValue(other);
1431         return Long.fromBits(this.low ^ other.low, this.high ^ other.high, this.unsigned);
1432     }
1433     eqz() {
1434         return this.isZero();
1435     }
1436     le(other) {
1437         return this.lessThanOrEqual(other);
1438     }
1439     toExtendedJSON(options) {
1440         if (options && options.relaxed)
1441             return this.toNumber();
1442         return { $numberLong: this.toString() };
1443     }
1444     static fromExtendedJSON(doc, options) {
1445         const { useBigInt64 = false, relaxed = true } = { ...options };
1446         if (doc.$numberLong.length > MAX_INT64_STRING_LENGTH) {
1447             throw new BSONError('$numberLong string is too long');
1448         }
1449         if (!DECIMAL_REG_EX.test(doc.$numberLong)) {
1450             throw new BSONError(`$numberLong string "${doc.$numberLong}" is in an invalid format`);
1451         }
1452         if (useBigInt64) {
1453             const bigIntResult = BigInt(doc.$numberLong);
1454             return BigInt.asIntN(64, bigIntResult);
1455         }
1456         const longResult = Long.fromString(doc.$numberLong);
1457         if (relaxed) {
1458             return longResult.toNumber();
1459         }
1460         return longResult;
1461     }
1462     inspect(depth, options, inspect) {
1463         inspect ??= defaultInspect;
1464         const longVal = inspect(this.toString(), options);
1465         const unsignedVal = this.unsigned ? `, ${inspect(this.unsigned, options)}` : '';
1466         return `new Long(${longVal}${unsignedVal})`;
1467     }
1468 }
1469 Long.TWO_PWR_24 = Long.fromInt(TWO_PWR_24_DBL);
1470 Long.MAX_UNSIGNED_VALUE = Long.fromBits(0xffffffff | 0, 0xffffffff | 0, true);
1471 Long.ZERO = Long.fromInt(0);
1472 Long.UZERO = Long.fromInt(0, true);
1473 Long.ONE = Long.fromInt(1);
1474 Long.UONE = Long.fromInt(1, true);
1475 Long.NEG_ONE = Long.fromInt(-1);
1476 Long.MAX_VALUE = Long.fromBits(0xffffffff | 0, 0x7fffffff | 0, false);
1477 Long.MIN_VALUE = Long.fromBits(0, 0x80000000 | 0, false);
1478 
1479 const PARSE_STRING_REGEXP = /^(\+|-)?(\d+|(\d*\.\d*))?(E|e)?([-+])?(\d+)?$/;
1480 const PARSE_INF_REGEXP = /^(\+|-)?(Infinity|inf)$/i;
1481 const PARSE_NAN_REGEXP = /^(\+|-)?NaN$/i;
1482 const EXPONENT_MAX = 6111;
1483 const EXPONENT_MIN = -6176;
1484 const EXPONENT_BIAS = 6176;
1485 const MAX_DIGITS = 34;
1486 const NAN_BUFFER = ByteUtils.fromNumberArray([
1487     0x7c, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00
1488 ].reverse());
1489 const INF_NEGATIVE_BUFFER = ByteUtils.fromNumberArray([
1490     0xf8, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00
1491 ].reverse());
1492 const INF_POSITIVE_BUFFER = ByteUtils.fromNumberArray([
1493     0x78, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00
1494 ].reverse());
1495 const EXPONENT_REGEX = /^([-+])?(\d+)?$/;
1496 const COMBINATION_MASK = 0x1f;
1497 const EXPONENT_MASK = 0x3fff;
1498 const COMBINATION_INFINITY = 30;
1499 const COMBINATION_NAN = 31;
1500 function isDigit(value) {
1501     return !isNaN(parseInt(value, 10));
1502 }
1503 function divideu128(value) {
1504     const DIVISOR = Long.fromNumber(1000 * 1000 * 1000);
1505     let _rem = Long.fromNumber(0);
1506     if (!value.parts[0] && !value.parts[1] && !value.parts[2] && !value.parts[3]) {
1507         return { quotient: value, rem: _rem };
1508     }
1509     for (let i = 0; i <= 3; i++) {
1510         _rem = _rem.shiftLeft(32);
1511         _rem = _rem.add(new Long(value.parts[i], 0));
1512         value.parts[i] = _rem.div(DIVISOR).low;
1513         _rem = _rem.modulo(DIVISOR);
1514     }
1515     return { quotient: value, rem: _rem };
1516 }
1517 function multiply64x2(left, right) {
1518     if (!left && !right) {
1519         return { high: Long.fromNumber(0), low: Long.fromNumber(0) };
1520     }
1521     const leftHigh = left.shiftRightUnsigned(32);
1522     const leftLow = new Long(left.getLowBits(), 0);
1523     const rightHigh = right.shiftRightUnsigned(32);
1524     const rightLow = new Long(right.getLowBits(), 0);
1525     let productHigh = leftHigh.multiply(rightHigh);
1526     let productMid = leftHigh.multiply(rightLow);
1527     const productMid2 = leftLow.multiply(rightHigh);
1528     let productLow = leftLow.multiply(rightLow);
1529     productHigh = productHigh.add(productMid.shiftRightUnsigned(32));
1530     productMid = new Long(productMid.getLowBits(), 0)
1531         .add(productMid2)
1532         .add(productLow.shiftRightUnsigned(32));
1533     productHigh = productHigh.add(productMid.shiftRightUnsigned(32));
1534     productLow = productMid.shiftLeft(32).add(new Long(productLow.getLowBits(), 0));
1535     return { high: productHigh, low: productLow };
1536 }
1537 function lessThan(left, right) {
1538     const uhleft = left.high >>> 0;
1539     const uhright = right.high >>> 0;
1540     if (uhleft < uhright) {
1541         return true;
1542     }
1543     else if (uhleft === uhright) {
1544         const ulleft = left.low >>> 0;
1545         const ulright = right.low >>> 0;
1546         if (ulleft < ulright)
1547             return true;
1548     }
1549     return false;
1550 }
1551 function invalidErr(string, message) {
1552     throw new BSONError(`"${string}" is not a valid Decimal128 string - ${message}`);
1553 }
1554 class Decimal128 extends BSONValue {
1555     get _bsontype() {
1556         return 'Decimal128';
1557     }
1558     constructor(bytes) {
1559         super();
1560         if (typeof bytes === 'string') {
1561             this.bytes = Decimal128.fromString(bytes).bytes;
1562         }
1563         else if (isUint8Array(bytes)) {
1564             if (bytes.byteLength !== 16) {
1565                 throw new BSONError('Decimal128 must take a Buffer of 16 bytes');
1566             }
1567             this.bytes = bytes;
1568         }
1569         else {
1570             throw new BSONError('Decimal128 must take a Buffer or string');
1571         }
1572     }
1573     static fromString(representation) {
1574         return Decimal128._fromString(representation, { allowRounding: false });
1575     }
1576     static fromStringWithRounding(representation) {
1577         return Decimal128._fromString(representation, { allowRounding: true });
1578     }
1579     static _fromString(representation, options) {
1580         let isNegative = false;
1581         let sawSign = false;
1582         let sawRadix = false;
1583         let foundNonZero = false;
1584         let significantDigits = 0;
1585         let nDigitsRead = 0;
1586         let nDigits = 0;
1587         let radixPosition = 0;
1588         let firstNonZero = 0;
1589         const digits = [0];
1590         let nDigitsStored = 0;
1591         let digitsInsert = 0;
1592         let lastDigit = 0;
1593         let exponent = 0;
1594         let significandHigh = new Long(0, 0);
1595         let significandLow = new Long(0, 0);
1596         let biasedExponent = 0;
1597         let index = 0;
1598         if (representation.length >= 7000) {
1599             throw new BSONError('' + representation + ' not a valid Decimal128 string');
1600         }
1601         const stringMatch = representation.match(PARSE_STRING_REGEXP);
1602         const infMatch = representation.match(PARSE_INF_REGEXP);
1603         const nanMatch = representation.match(PARSE_NAN_REGEXP);
1604         if ((!stringMatch && !infMatch && !nanMatch) || representation.length === 0) {
1605             throw new BSONError('' + representation + ' not a valid Decimal128 string');
1606         }
1607         if (stringMatch) {
1608             const unsignedNumber = stringMatch[2];
1609             const e = stringMatch[4];
1610             const expSign = stringMatch[5];
1611             const expNumber = stringMatch[6];
1612             if (e && expNumber === undefined)
1613                 invalidErr(representation, 'missing exponent power');
1614             if (e && unsignedNumber === undefined)
1615                 invalidErr(representation, 'missing exponent base');
1616             if (e === undefined && (expSign || expNumber)) {
1617                 invalidErr(representation, 'missing e before exponent');
1618             }
1619         }
1620         if (representation[index] === '+' || representation[index] === '-') {
1621             sawSign = true;
1622             isNegative = representation[index++] === '-';
1623         }
1624         if (!isDigit(representation[index]) && representation[index] !== '.') {
1625             if (representation[index] === 'i' || representation[index] === 'I') {
1626                 return new Decimal128(isNegative ? INF_NEGATIVE_BUFFER : INF_POSITIVE_BUFFER);
1627             }
1628             else if (representation[index] === 'N') {
1629                 return new Decimal128(NAN_BUFFER);
1630             }
1631         }
1632         while (isDigit(representation[index]) || representation[index] === '.') {
1633             if (representation[index] === '.') {
1634                 if (sawRadix)
1635                     invalidErr(representation, 'contains multiple periods');
1636                 sawRadix = true;
1637                 index = index + 1;
1638                 continue;
1639             }
1640             if (nDigitsStored < MAX_DIGITS) {
1641                 if (representation[index] !== '0' || foundNonZero) {
1642                     if (!foundNonZero) {
1643                         firstNonZero = nDigitsRead;
1644                     }
1645                     foundNonZero = true;
1646                     digits[digitsInsert++] = parseInt(representation[index], 10);
1647                     nDigitsStored = nDigitsStored + 1;
1648                 }
1649             }
1650             if (foundNonZero)
1651                 nDigits = nDigits + 1;
1652             if (sawRadix)
1653                 radixPosition = radixPosition + 1;
1654             nDigitsRead = nDigitsRead + 1;
1655             index = index + 1;
1656         }
1657         if (sawRadix && !nDigitsRead)
1658             throw new BSONError('' + representation + ' not a valid Decimal128 string');
1659         if (representation[index] === 'e' || representation[index] === 'E') {
1660             const match = representation.substr(++index).match(EXPONENT_REGEX);
1661             if (!match || !match[2])
1662                 return new Decimal128(NAN_BUFFER);
1663             exponent = parseInt(match[0], 10);
1664             index = index + match[0].length;
1665         }
1666         if (representation[index])
1667             return new Decimal128(NAN_BUFFER);
1668         if (!nDigitsStored) {
1669             digits[0] = 0;
1670             nDigits = 1;
1671             nDigitsStored = 1;
1672             significantDigits = 0;
1673         }
1674         else {
1675             lastDigit = nDigitsStored - 1;
1676             significantDigits = nDigits;
1677             if (significantDigits !== 1) {
1678                 while (representation[firstNonZero + significantDigits - 1 + Number(sawSign) + Number(sawRadix)] === '0') {
1679                     significantDigits = significantDigits - 1;
1680                 }
1681             }
1682         }
1683         if (exponent <= radixPosition && radixPosition > exponent + (1 << 14)) {
1684             exponent = EXPONENT_MIN;
1685         }
1686         else {
1687             exponent = exponent - radixPosition;
1688         }
1689         while (exponent > EXPONENT_MAX) {
1690             lastDigit = lastDigit + 1;
1691             if (lastDigit >= MAX_DIGITS) {
1692                 if (significantDigits === 0) {
1693                     exponent = EXPONENT_MAX;
1694                     break;
1695                 }
1696                 invalidErr(representation, 'overflow');
1697             }
1698             exponent = exponent - 1;
1699         }
1700         if (options.allowRounding) {
1701             while (exponent < EXPONENT_MIN || nDigitsStored < nDigits) {
1702                 if (lastDigit === 0 && significantDigits < nDigitsStored) {
1703                     exponent = EXPONENT_MIN;
1704                     significantDigits = 0;
1705                     break;
1706                 }
1707                 if (nDigitsStored < nDigits) {
1708                     nDigits = nDigits - 1;
1709                 }
1710                 else {
1711                     lastDigit = lastDigit - 1;
1712                 }
1713                 if (exponent < EXPONENT_MAX) {
1714                     exponent = exponent + 1;
1715                 }
1716                 else {
1717                     const digitsString = digits.join('');
1718                     if (digitsString.match(/^0+$/)) {
1719                         exponent = EXPONENT_MAX;
1720                         break;
1721                     }
1722                     invalidErr(representation, 'overflow');
1723                 }
1724             }
1725             if (lastDigit + 1 < significantDigits) {
1726                 let endOfString = nDigitsRead;
1727                 if (sawRadix) {
1728                     firstNonZero = firstNonZero + 1;
1729                     endOfString = endOfString + 1;
1730                 }
1731                 if (sawSign) {
1732                     firstNonZero = firstNonZero + 1;
1733                     endOfString = endOfString + 1;
1734                 }
1735                 const roundDigit = parseInt(representation[firstNonZero + lastDigit + 1], 10);
1736                 let roundBit = 0;
1737                 if (roundDigit >= 5) {
1738                     roundBit = 1;
1739                     if (roundDigit === 5) {
1740                         roundBit = digits[lastDigit] % 2 === 1 ? 1 : 0;
1741                         for (let i = firstNonZero + lastDigit + 2; i < endOfString; i++) {
1742                             if (parseInt(representation[i], 10)) {
1743                                 roundBit = 1;
1744                                 break;
1745                             }
1746                         }
1747                     }
1748                 }
1749                 if (roundBit) {
1750                     let dIdx = lastDigit;
1751                     for (; dIdx >= 0; dIdx--) {
1752                         if (++digits[dIdx] > 9) {
1753                             digits[dIdx] = 0;
1754                             if (dIdx === 0) {
1755                                 if (exponent < EXPONENT_MAX) {
1756                                     exponent = exponent + 1;
1757                                     digits[dIdx] = 1;
1758                                 }
1759                                 else {
1760                                     return new Decimal128(isNegative ? INF_NEGATIVE_BUFFER : INF_POSITIVE_BUFFER);
1761                                 }
1762                             }
1763                         }
1764                         else {
1765                             break;
1766                         }
1767                     }
1768                 }
1769             }
1770         }
1771         else {
1772             while (exponent < EXPONENT_MIN || nDigitsStored < nDigits) {
1773                 if (lastDigit === 0) {
1774                     if (significantDigits === 0) {
1775                         exponent = EXPONENT_MIN;
1776                         break;
1777                     }
1778                     invalidErr(representation, 'exponent underflow');
1779                 }
1780                 if (nDigitsStored < nDigits) {
1781                     if (representation[nDigits - 1 + Number(sawSign) + Number(sawRadix)] !== '0' &&
1782                         significantDigits !== 0) {
1783                         invalidErr(representation, 'inexact rounding');
1784                     }
1785                     nDigits = nDigits - 1;
1786                 }
1787                 else {
1788                     if (digits[lastDigit] !== 0) {
1789                         invalidErr(representation, 'inexact rounding');
1790                     }
1791                     lastDigit = lastDigit - 1;
1792                 }
1793                 if (exponent < EXPONENT_MAX) {
1794                     exponent = exponent + 1;
1795                 }
1796                 else {
1797                     invalidErr(representation, 'overflow');
1798                 }
1799             }
1800             if (lastDigit + 1 < significantDigits) {
1801                 if (sawRadix) {
1802                     firstNonZero = firstNonZero + 1;
1803                 }
1804                 if (sawSign) {
1805                     firstNonZero = firstNonZero + 1;
1806                 }
1807                 const roundDigit = parseInt(representation[firstNonZero + lastDigit + 1], 10);
1808                 if (roundDigit !== 0) {
1809                     invalidErr(representation, 'inexact rounding');
1810                 }
1811             }
1812         }
1813         significandHigh = Long.fromNumber(0);
1814         significandLow = Long.fromNumber(0);
1815         if (significantDigits === 0) {
1816             significandHigh = Long.fromNumber(0);
1817             significandLow = Long.fromNumber(0);
1818         }
1819         else if (lastDigit < 17) {
1820             let dIdx = 0;
1821             significandLow = Long.fromNumber(digits[dIdx++]);
1822             significandHigh = new Long(0, 0);
1823             for (; dIdx <= lastDigit; dIdx++) {
1824                 significandLow = significandLow.multiply(Long.fromNumber(10));
1825                 significandLow = significandLow.add(Long.fromNumber(digits[dIdx]));
1826             }
1827         }
1828         else {
1829             let dIdx = 0;
1830             significandHigh = Long.fromNumber(digits[dIdx++]);
1831             for (; dIdx <= lastDigit - 17; dIdx++) {
1832                 significandHigh = significandHigh.multiply(Long.fromNumber(10));
1833                 significandHigh = significandHigh.add(Long.fromNumber(digits[dIdx]));
1834             }
1835             significandLow = Long.fromNumber(digits[dIdx++]);
1836             for (; dIdx <= lastDigit; dIdx++) {
1837                 significandLow = significandLow.multiply(Long.fromNumber(10));
1838                 significandLow = significandLow.add(Long.fromNumber(digits[dIdx]));
1839             }
1840         }
1841         const significand = multiply64x2(significandHigh, Long.fromString('100000000000000000'));
1842         significand.low = significand.low.add(significandLow);
1843         if (lessThan(significand.low, significandLow)) {
1844             significand.high = significand.high.add(Long.fromNumber(1));
1845         }
1846         biasedExponent = exponent + EXPONENT_BIAS;
1847         const dec = { low: Long.fromNumber(0), high: Long.fromNumber(0) };
1848         if (significand.high.shiftRightUnsigned(49).and(Long.fromNumber(1)).equals(Long.fromNumber(1))) {
1849             dec.high = dec.high.or(Long.fromNumber(0x3).shiftLeft(61));
1850             dec.high = dec.high.or(Long.fromNumber(biasedExponent).and(Long.fromNumber(0x3fff).shiftLeft(47)));
1851             dec.high = dec.high.or(significand.high.and(Long.fromNumber(0x7fffffffffff)));
1852         }
1853         else {
1854             dec.high = dec.high.or(Long.fromNumber(biasedExponent & 0x3fff).shiftLeft(49));
1855             dec.high = dec.high.or(significand.high.and(Long.fromNumber(0x1ffffffffffff)));
1856         }
1857         dec.low = significand.low;
1858         if (isNegative) {
1859             dec.high = dec.high.or(Long.fromString('9223372036854775808'));
1860         }
1861         const buffer = ByteUtils.allocateUnsafe(16);
1862         index = 0;
1863         buffer[index++] = dec.low.low & 0xff;
1864         buffer[index++] = (dec.low.low >> 8) & 0xff;
1865         buffer[index++] = (dec.low.low >> 16) & 0xff;
1866         buffer[index++] = (dec.low.low >> 24) & 0xff;
1867         buffer[index++] = dec.low.high & 0xff;
1868         buffer[index++] = (dec.low.high >> 8) & 0xff;
1869         buffer[index++] = (dec.low.high >> 16) & 0xff;
1870         buffer[index++] = (dec.low.high >> 24) & 0xff;
1871         buffer[index++] = dec.high.low & 0xff;
1872         buffer[index++] = (dec.high.low >> 8) & 0xff;
1873         buffer[index++] = (dec.high.low >> 16) & 0xff;
1874         buffer[index++] = (dec.high.low >> 24) & 0xff;
1875         buffer[index++] = dec.high.high & 0xff;
1876         buffer[index++] = (dec.high.high >> 8) & 0xff;
1877         buffer[index++] = (dec.high.high >> 16) & 0xff;
1878         buffer[index++] = (dec.high.high >> 24) & 0xff;
1879         return new Decimal128(buffer);
1880     }
1881     toString() {
1882         let biased_exponent;
1883         let significand_digits = 0;
1884         const significand = new Array(36);
1885         for (let i = 0; i < significand.length; i++)
1886             significand[i] = 0;
1887         let index = 0;
1888         let is_zero = false;
1889         let significand_msb;
1890         let significand128 = { parts: [0, 0, 0, 0] };
1891         let j, k;
1892         const string = [];
1893         index = 0;
1894         const buffer = this.bytes;
1895         const low = buffer[index++] | (buffer[index++] << 8) | (buffer[index++] << 16) | (buffer[index++] << 24);
1896         const midl = buffer[index++] | (buffer[index++] << 8) | (buffer[index++] << 16) | (buffer[index++] << 24);
1897         const midh = buffer[index++] | (buffer[index++] << 8) | (buffer[index++] << 16) | (buffer[index++] << 24);
1898         const high = buffer[index++] | (buffer[index++] << 8) | (buffer[index++] << 16) | (buffer[index++] << 24);
1899         index = 0;
1900         const dec = {
1901             low: new Long(low, midl),
1902             high: new Long(midh, high)
1903         };
1904         if (dec.high.lessThan(Long.ZERO)) {
1905             string.push('-');
1906         }
1907         const combination = (high >> 26) & COMBINATION_MASK;
1908         if (combination >> 3 === 3) {
1909             if (combination === COMBINATION_INFINITY) {
1910                 return string.join('') + 'Infinity';
1911             }
1912             else if (combination === COMBINATION_NAN) {
1913                 return 'NaN';
1914             }
1915             else {
1916                 biased_exponent = (high >> 15) & EXPONENT_MASK;
1917                 significand_msb = 0x08 + ((high >> 14) & 0x01);
1918             }
1919         }
1920         else {
1921             significand_msb = (high >> 14) & 0x07;
1922             biased_exponent = (high >> 17) & EXPONENT_MASK;
1923         }
1924         const exponent = biased_exponent - EXPONENT_BIAS;
1925         significand128.parts[0] = (high & 0x3fff) + ((significand_msb & 0xf) << 14);
1926         significand128.parts[1] = midh;
1927         significand128.parts[2] = midl;
1928         significand128.parts[3] = low;
1929         if (significand128.parts[0] === 0 &&
1930             significand128.parts[1] === 0 &&
1931             significand128.parts[2] === 0 &&
1932             significand128.parts[3] === 0) {
1933             is_zero = true;
1934         }
1935         else {
1936             for (k = 3; k >= 0; k--) {
1937                 let least_digits = 0;
1938                 const result = divideu128(significand128);
1939                 significand128 = result.quotient;
1940                 least_digits = result.rem.low;
1941                 if (!least_digits)
1942                     continue;
1943                 for (j = 8; j >= 0; j--) {
1944                     significand[k * 9 + j] = least_digits % 10;
1945                     least_digits = Math.floor(least_digits / 10);
1946                 }
1947             }
1948         }
1949         if (is_zero) {
1950             significand_digits = 1;
1951             significand[index] = 0;
1952         }
1953         else {
1954             significand_digits = 36;
1955             while (!significand[index]) {
1956                 significand_digits = significand_digits - 1;
1957                 index = index + 1;
1958             }
1959         }
1960         const scientific_exponent = significand_digits - 1 + exponent;
1961         if (scientific_exponent >= 34 || scientific_exponent <= -7 || exponent > 0) {
1962             if (significand_digits > 34) {
1963                 string.push(`${0}`);
1964                 if (exponent > 0)
1965                     string.push(`E+${exponent}`);
1966                 else if (exponent < 0)
1967                     string.push(`E${exponent}`);
1968                 return string.join('');
1969             }
1970             string.push(`${significand[index++]}`);
1971             significand_digits = significand_digits - 1;
1972             if (significand_digits) {
1973                 string.push('.');
1974             }
1975             for (let i = 0; i < significand_digits; i++) {
1976                 string.push(`${significand[index++]}`);
1977             }
1978             string.push('E');
1979             if (scientific_exponent > 0) {
1980                 string.push(`+${scientific_exponent}`);
1981             }
1982             else {
1983                 string.push(`${scientific_exponent}`);
1984             }
1985         }
1986         else {
1987             if (exponent >= 0) {
1988                 for (let i = 0; i < significand_digits; i++) {
1989                     string.push(`${significand[index++]}`);
1990                 }
1991             }
1992             else {
1993                 let radix_position = significand_digits + exponent;
1994                 if (radix_position > 0) {
1995                     for (let i = 0; i < radix_position; i++) {
1996                         string.push(`${significand[index++]}`);
1997                     }
1998                 }
1999                 else {
2000                     string.push('0');
2001                 }
2002                 string.push('.');
2003                 while (radix_position++ < 0) {
2004                     string.push('0');
2005                 }
2006                 for (let i = 0; i < significand_digits - Math.max(radix_position - 1, 0); i++) {
2007                     string.push(`${significand[index++]}`);
2008                 }
2009             }
2010         }
2011         return string.join('');
2012     }
2013     toJSON() {
2014         return { $numberDecimal: this.toString() };
2015     }
2016     toExtendedJSON() {
2017         return { $numberDecimal: this.toString() };
2018     }
2019     static fromExtendedJSON(doc) {
2020         return Decimal128.fromString(doc.$numberDecimal);
2021     }
2022     inspect(depth, options, inspect) {
2023         inspect ??= defaultInspect;
2024         const d128string = inspect(this.toString(), options);
2025         return `new Decimal128(${d128string})`;
2026     }

2259         super();
2260         let workingId;

2262             if (typeof inputId.id !== 'string' && !ArrayBuffer.isView(inputId.id)) {
2263                 throw new BSONError('Argument passed in must have an id that is of type string or Buffer');
2264             }

2266                 workingId = ByteUtils.fromHex(inputId.toHexString());
