2429     }
2430     static fromExtendedJSON(doc) {
2431         return new ObjectId(doc.$oid);
2432     }
2433     inspect(depth, options, inspect) {
2434         inspect ??= defaultInspect;
2435         return `new ObjectId(${inspect(this.toHexString(), options)})`;
2436     }
2437 }
2438 ObjectId.index = Math.floor(Math.random() * 0xffffff);
2439 
2440 function internalCalculateObjectSize(object, serializeFunctions, ignoreUndefined) {
2441     let totalLength = 4 + 1;
2442     if (Array.isArray(object)) {
2443         for (let i = 0; i < object.length; i++) {
2444             totalLength += calculateElement(i.toString(), object[i], serializeFunctions, true, ignoreUndefined);
2445         }
2446     }
2447     else {
2448         if (typeof object?.toBSON === 'function') {
2449             object = object.toBSON();
2450         }
2451         for (const key of Object.keys(object)) {
2452             totalLength += calculateElement(key, object[key], serializeFunctions, false, ignoreUndefined);
2453         }
2454     }
2455     return totalLength;
2456 }
2457 function calculateElement(name, value, serializeFunctions = false, isArray = false, ignoreUndefined = false) {
2458     if (typeof value?.toBSON === 'function') {
2459         value = value.toBSON();
2460     }
2461     switch (typeof value) {
2462         case 'string':
2463             return 1 + ByteUtils.utf8ByteLength(name) + 1 + 4 + ByteUtils.utf8ByteLength(value) + 1;
2464         case 'number':
2465             if (Math.floor(value) === value &&
2466                 value >= JS_INT_MIN &&
2467                 value <= JS_INT_MAX) {
2468                 if (value >= BSON_INT32_MIN && value <= BSON_INT32_MAX) {
2469                     return (name != null ? ByteUtils.utf8ByteLength(name) + 1 : 0) + (4 + 1);
2470                 }
2471                 else {
2472                     return (name != null ? ByteUtils.utf8ByteLength(name) + 1 : 0) + (8 + 1);
2473                 }
2474             }
2475             else {
2476                 return (name != null ? ByteUtils.utf8ByteLength(name) + 1 : 0) + (8 + 1);
2477             }
2478         case 'undefined':
2479             if (isArray || !ignoreUndefined)
2480                 return (name != null ? ByteUtils.utf8ByteLength(name) + 1 : 0) + 1;
2481             return 0;
2482         case 'boolean':
2483             return (name != null ? ByteUtils.utf8ByteLength(name) + 1 : 0) + (1 + 1);
2484         case 'object':
2485             if (value != null &&
2486                 typeof value._bsontype === 'string' &&
2487                 value[Symbol.for('@@mdb.bson.version')] !== BSON_MAJOR_VERSION) {
2488                 throw new BSONVersionError();
2489             }
2490             else if (value == null || value._bsontype === 'MinKey' || value._bsontype === 'MaxKey') {
2491                 return (name != null ? ByteUtils.utf8ByteLength(name) + 1 : 0) + 1;
2492             }
2493             else if (value._bsontype === 'ObjectId') {
2494                 return (name != null ? ByteUtils.utf8ByteLength(name) + 1 : 0) + (12 + 1);
2495             }
2496             else if (value instanceof Date || isDate(value)) {
2497                 return (name != null ? ByteUtils.utf8ByteLength(name) + 1 : 0) + (8 + 1);
2498             }
2499             else if (ArrayBuffer.isView(value) ||
2500                 value instanceof ArrayBuffer ||
2501                 isAnyArrayBuffer(value)) {
2502                 return ((name != null ? ByteUtils.utf8ByteLength(name) + 1 : 0) + (1 + 4 + 1) + value.byteLength);
2503             }
2504             else if (value._bsontype === 'Long' ||
2505                 value._bsontype === 'Double' ||
2506                 value._bsontype === 'Timestamp') {
2507                 return (name != null ? ByteUtils.utf8ByteLength(name) + 1 : 0) + (8 + 1);
2508             }
2509             else if (value._bsontype === 'Decimal128') {
2510                 return (name != null ? ByteUtils.utf8ByteLength(name) + 1 : 0) + (16 + 1);
2511             }
2512             else if (value._bsontype === 'Code') {
2513                 if (value.scope != null && Object.keys(value.scope).length > 0) {
2514                     return ((name != null ? ByteUtils.utf8ByteLength(name) + 1 : 0) +
2515                         1 +
2516                         4 +
2517                         4 +
2518                         ByteUtils.utf8ByteLength(value.code.toString()) +
2519                         1 +
2520                         internalCalculateObjectSize(value.scope, serializeFunctions, ignoreUndefined));
2521                 }
2522                 else {
2523                     return ((name != null ? ByteUtils.utf8ByteLength(name) + 1 : 0) +
2524                         1 +
2525                         4 +
2526                         ByteUtils.utf8ByteLength(value.code.toString()) +
2527                         1);
2528                 }
2529             }
2530             else if (value._bsontype === 'Binary') {
2531                 const binary = value;
2532                 if (binary.sub_type === Binary.SUBTYPE_BYTE_ARRAY) {
2533                     return ((name != null ? ByteUtils.utf8ByteLength(name) + 1 : 0) +
2534                         (binary.position + 1 + 4 + 1 + 4));
2535                 }
2536                 else {
2537                     return ((name != null ? ByteUtils.utf8ByteLength(name) + 1 : 0) + (binary.position + 1 + 4 + 1));
2538                 }
2539             }
2540             else if (value._bsontype === 'Symbol') {
2541                 return ((name != null ? ByteUtils.utf8ByteLength(name) + 1 : 0) +
2542                     ByteUtils.utf8ByteLength(value.value) +
2543                     4 +
2544                     1 +
2545                     1);
2546             }
2547             else if (value._bsontype === 'DBRef') {
2548                 const ordered_values = Object.assign({
2549                     $ref: value.collection,
2550                     $id: value.oid
2551                 }, value.fields);
2552                 if (value.db != null) {
2553                     ordered_values['$db'] = value.db;
2554                 }
2555                 return ((name != null ? ByteUtils.utf8ByteLength(name) + 1 : 0) +
2556                     1 +
2557                     internalCalculateObjectSize(ordered_values, serializeFunctions, ignoreUndefined));
2558             }
2559             else if (value instanceof RegExp || isRegExp(value)) {
2560                 return ((name != null ? ByteUtils.utf8ByteLength(name) + 1 : 0) +
2561                     1 +
2562                     ByteUtils.utf8ByteLength(value.source) +
2563                     1 +
2564                     (value.global ? 1 : 0) +
2565                     (value.ignoreCase ? 1 : 0) +
2566                     (value.multiline ? 1 : 0) +
2567                     1);
2568             }
2569             else if (value._bsontype === 'BSONRegExp') {
2570                 return ((name != null ? ByteUtils.utf8ByteLength(name) + 1 : 0) +
2571                     1 +
2572                     ByteUtils.utf8ByteLength(value.pattern) +
2573                     1 +
2574                     ByteUtils.utf8ByteLength(value.options) +
2575                     1);
2576             }
2577             else {
2578                 return ((name != null ? ByteUtils.utf8ByteLength(name) + 1 : 0) +
2579                     internalCalculateObjectSize(value, serializeFunctions, ignoreUndefined) +
2580                     1);
2581             }
2582         case 'function':
2583             if (serializeFunctions) {
2584                 return ((name != null ? ByteUtils.utf8ByteLength(name) + 1 : 0) +
2585                     1 +
2586                     4 +
2587                     ByteUtils.utf8ByteLength(value.toString()) +
2588                     1);
2589             }
2590     }
2591     return 0;
2592 }
2593 
2594 function alphabetize(str) {
2595     return str.split('').sort().join('');
2596 }
2597 class BSONRegExp extends BSONValue {
2598     get _bsontype() {
2599         return 'BSONRegExp';
2600     }
2601     constructor(pattern, options) {
2602         super();
2603         this.pattern = pattern;
2604         this.options = alphabetize(options ?? '');
2605         if (this.pattern.indexOf('\x00') !== -1) {
2606             throw new BSONError(`BSON Regex patterns cannot contain null bytes, found: ${JSON.stringify(this.pattern)}`);
2607         }
2608         if (this.options.indexOf('\x00') !== -1) {
2609             throw new BSONError(`BSON Regex options cannot contain null bytes, found: ${JSON.stringify(this.options)}`);
2610         }
2611         for (let i = 0; i < this.options.length; i++) {
2612             if (!(this.options[i] === 'i' ||
2613                 this.options[i] === 'm' ||
2614                 this.options[i] === 'x' ||
2615                 this.options[i] === 'l' ||
2616                 this.options[i] === 's' ||
2617                 this.options[i] === 'u')) {
2618                 throw new BSONError(`The regular expression option [${this.options[i]}] is not supported`);
2619             }
2620         }
2621     }
2622     static parseOptions(options) {
2623         return options ? options.split('').sort().join('') : '';
2624     }
2625     toExtendedJSON(options) {
2626         options = options || {};
2627         if (options.legacy) {
2628             return { $regex: this.pattern, $options: this.options };
2629         }
2630         return { $regularExpression: { pattern: this.pattern, options: this.options } };
2631     }
2632     static fromExtendedJSON(doc) {
2633         if ('$regex' in doc) {
2634             if (typeof doc.$regex !== 'string') {
2635                 if (doc.$regex._bsontype === 'BSONRegExp') {
2636                     return doc;
2637                 }
2638             }
2639             else {
2640                 return new BSONRegExp(doc.$regex, BSONRegExp.parseOptions(doc.$options));
2641             }
2642         }
2643         if ('$regularExpression' in doc) {
2644             return new BSONRegExp(doc.$regularExpression.pattern, BSONRegExp.parseOptions(doc.$regularExpression.options));
2645         }
2646         throw new BSONError(`Unexpected BSONRegExp EJSON object form: ${JSON.stringify(doc)}`);
2647     }
2648     inspect(depth, options, inspect) {
2649         const stylize = getStylizeFunction(options) ?? (v => v);
2650         inspect ??= defaultInspect;
2651         const pattern = stylize(inspect(this.pattern), 'regexp');
2652         const flags = stylize(inspect(this.options), 'regexp');
2653         return `new BSONRegExp(${pattern}, ${flags})`;
2654     }
2655 }

2686 const LongWithoutOverridesClass = Long;
2687 class Timestamp extends LongWithoutOverridesClass {
2688     get _bsontype() {
2689         return 'Timestamp';
2690     }
2691     constructor(low) {
2692         if (low == null) {
2693             super(0, 0, true);
2694         }
2695         else if (typeof low === 'bigint') {
2696             super(low, true);
2697         }
2698         else if (Long.isLong(low)) {
2699             super(low.low, low.high, true);
2700         }
2701         else if (typeof low === 'object' && 't' in low && 'i' in low) {
2702             if (typeof low.t !== 'number' && (typeof low.t !== 'object' || low.t._bsontype !== 'Int32')) {
2703                 throw new BSONError('Timestamp constructed from { t, i } must provide t as a number');
2704             }
2705             if (typeof low.i !== 'number' && (typeof low.i !== 'object' || low.i._bsontype !== 'Int32')) {
2706                 throw new BSONError('Timestamp constructed from { t, i } must provide i as a number');
2707             }
2708             const t = Number(low.t);
2709             const i = Number(low.i);
2710             if (t < 0 || Number.isNaN(t)) {
2711                 throw new BSONError('Timestamp constructed from { t, i } must provide a positive t');
2712             }
2713             if (i < 0 || Number.isNaN(i)) {
2714                 throw new BSONError('Timestamp constructed from { t, i } must provide a positive i');
2715             }
2716             if (t > 4294967295) {
2717                 throw new BSONError('Timestamp constructed from { t, i } must provide t equal or less than uint32 max');
2718             }
2719             if (i > 4294967295) {
2720                 throw new BSONError('Timestamp constructed from { t, i } must provide i equal or less than uint32 max');
2721             }
2722             super(i, t, true);
2723         }
2724         else {
2725             throw new BSONError('A Timestamp can only be constructed with: bigint, Long, or { t: number; i: number }');
2726         }
2727     }
2728     toJSON() {
2729         return {
2730             $timestamp: this.toString()
2731         };
2732     }
2733     static fromInt(value) {
2734         return new Timestamp(Long.fromInt(value, true));
2735     }
2736     static fromNumber(value) {
2737         return new Timestamp(Long.fromNumber(value, true));
2738     }
2739     static fromBits(lowBits, highBits) {
2740         return new Timestamp({ i: lowBits, t: highBits });
2741     }
2742     static fromString(str, optRadix) {
2743         return new Timestamp(Long.fromString(str, true, optRadix));
2744     }
2745     toExtendedJSON() {
2746         return { $timestamp: { t: this.high >>> 0, i: this.low >>> 0 } };
2747     }
2748     static fromExtendedJSON(doc) {
2749         const i = Long.isLong(doc.$timestamp.i)
2750             ? doc.$timestamp.i.getLowBitsUnsigned()
2751             : doc.$timestamp.i;
2752         const t = Long.isLong(doc.$timestamp.t)
2753             ? doc.$timestamp.t.getLowBitsUnsigned()
2754             : doc.$timestamp.t;
2755         return new Timestamp({ t, i });
2756     }
2757     inspect(depth, options, inspect) {
2758         inspect ??= defaultInspect;
2759         const t = inspect(this.high >>> 0, options);
2760         const i = inspect(this.low >>> 0, options);
2761         return `new Timestamp({ t: ${t}, i: ${i} })`;
2762     }
2763 }
2764 Timestamp.MAX_VALUE = Long.MAX_UNSIGNED_VALUE;

2766 const JS_INT_MAX_LONG = Long.fromNumber(JS_INT_MAX);
2767 const JS_INT_MIN_LONG = Long.fromNumber(JS_INT_MIN);
2768 function internalDeserialize(buffer, options, isArray) {
2769     options = options == null ? {} : options;
2770     const index = options && options.index ? options.index : 0;
2771     const size = NumberUtils.getInt32LE(buffer, index);
2772     if (size < 5) {
2773         throw new BSONError(`bson size must be >= 5, is ${size}`);
2774     }
2775     if (options.allowObjectSmallerThanBufferSize && buffer.length < size) {
2776         throw new BSONError(`buffer length ${buffer.length} must be >= bson size ${size}`);
2777     }
2778     if (!options.allowObjectSmallerThanBufferSize && buffer.length !== size) {
2779         throw new BSONError(`buffer length ${buffer.length} must === bson size ${size}`);
2780     }
2781     if (size + index > buffer.byteLength) {
2782         throw new BSONError(`(bson size ${size} + options.index ${index} must be <= buffer length ${buffer.byteLength})`);
2783     }
2784     if (buffer[index + size - 1] !== 0) {
2785         throw new BSONError("One object, sized correctly, with a spot for an EOO, but the EOO isn't 0x00");
2786     }
2787     return deserializeObject(buffer, index, options, isArray);
2788 }
2789 const allowedDBRefKeys = /^\$ref$|^\$id$|^\$db$/;
2790 function deserializeObject(buffer, index, options, isArray = false) {
2791     const fieldsAsRaw = options['fieldsAsRaw'] == null ? null : options['fieldsAsRaw'];
2792     const raw = options['raw'] == null ? false : options['raw'];
2793     const bsonRegExp = typeof options['bsonRegExp'] === 'boolean' ? options['bsonRegExp'] : false;
2794     const promoteBuffers = options.promoteBuffers ?? false;
2795     const promoteLongs = options.promoteLongs ?? true;
2796     const promoteValues = options.promoteValues ?? true;
2797     const useBigInt64 = options.useBigInt64 ?? false;
2798     if (useBigInt64 && !promoteValues) {
2799         throw new BSONError('Must either request bigint or Long for int64 deserialization');
2800     }
2801     if (useBigInt64 && !promoteLongs) {
2802         throw new BSONError('Must either request bigint or Long for int64 deserialization');
2803     }
2804     const validation = options.validation == null ? { utf8: true } : options.validation;
2805     let globalUTFValidation = true;
2806     let validationSetting;
2807     let utf8KeysSet;
2808     const utf8ValidatedKeys = validation.utf8;
2809     if (typeof utf8ValidatedKeys === 'boolean') {
2810         validationSetting = utf8ValidatedKeys;
2811     }
2812     else {
2813         globalUTFValidation = false;
2814         const utf8ValidationValues = Object.keys(utf8ValidatedKeys).map(function (key) {
2815             return utf8ValidatedKeys[key];
2816         });
2817         if (utf8ValidationValues.length === 0) {
2818             throw new BSONError('UTF-8 validation setting cannot be empty');
2819         }
2820         if (typeof utf8ValidationValues[0] !== 'boolean') {
2821             throw new BSONError('Invalid UTF-8 validation option, must specify boolean values');
2822         }
2823         validationSetting = utf8ValidationValues[0];
2824         if (!utf8ValidationValues.every(item => item === validationSetting)) {
2825             throw new BSONError('Invalid UTF-8 validation option - keys must be all true or all false');
2826         }
2827     }
2828     if (!globalUTFValidation) {
2829         utf8KeysSet = new Set();
2830         for (const key of Object.keys(utf8ValidatedKeys)) {
2831             utf8KeysSet.add(key);
2832         }
2833     }
2834     const startIndex = index;
2835     if (buffer.length < 5)
2836         throw new BSONError('corrupt bson message < 5 bytes long');
2837     const size = NumberUtils.getInt32LE(buffer, index);
2838     index += 4;
2839     if (size < 5 || size > buffer.length)
2840         throw new BSONError('corrupt bson message');
2841     const object = isArray ? [] : {};
2842     let arrayIndex = 0;
2843     const done = false;
2844     let isPossibleDBRef = isArray ? false : null;
2845     while (!done) {
2846         const elementType = buffer[index++];
2847         if (elementType === 0)
2848             break;
2849         let i = index;
2850         while (buffer[i] !== 0x00 && i < buffer.length) {
2851             i++;
2852         }
2853         if (i >= buffer.byteLength)
2854             throw new BSONError('Bad BSON Document: illegal CString');
2855         const name = isArray ? arrayIndex++ : ByteUtils.toUTF8(buffer, index, i, false);
2856         let shouldValidateKey = true;
2857         if (globalUTFValidation || utf8KeysSet?.has(name)) {
2858             shouldValidateKey = validationSetting;
2859         }
2860         else {
2861             shouldValidateKey = !validationSetting;
2862         }
2863         if (isPossibleDBRef !== false && name[0] === '$') {
2864             isPossibleDBRef = allowedDBRefKeys.test(name);
2865         }
2866         let value;
2867         index = i + 1;
2868         if (elementType === BSON_DATA_STRING) {
2869             const stringSize = NumberUtils.getInt32LE(buffer, index);
2870             index += 4;
2871             if (stringSize <= 0 ||
2872                 stringSize > buffer.length - index ||
2873                 buffer[index + stringSize - 1] !== 0) {
2874                 throw new BSONError('bad string length in bson');
2875             }
2876             value = ByteUtils.toUTF8(buffer, index, index + stringSize - 1, shouldValidateKey);
2877             index = index + stringSize;
2878         }
2879         else if (elementType === BSON_DATA_OID) {
2880             const oid = ByteUtils.allocateUnsafe(12);
2881             for (let i = 0; i < 12; i++)
2882                 oid[i] = buffer[index + i];
2883             value = new ObjectId(oid);
2884             index = index + 12;
2885         }
2886         else if (elementType === BSON_DATA_INT && promoteValues === false) {
2887             value = new Int32(NumberUtils.getInt32LE(buffer, index));
2888             index += 4;
2889         }
2890         else if (elementType === BSON_DATA_INT) {
2891             value = NumberUtils.getInt32LE(buffer, index);
2892             index += 4;
2893         }
2894         else if (elementType === BSON_DATA_NUMBER) {
2895             value = NumberUtils.getFloat64LE(buffer, index);
2896             index += 8;
2897             if (promoteValues === false)
2898                 value = new Double(value);
2899         }
2900         else if (elementType === BSON_DATA_DATE) {
2901             const lowBits = NumberUtils.getInt32LE(buffer, index);
2902             const highBits = NumberUtils.getInt32LE(buffer, index + 4);
2903             index += 8;
2904             value = new Date(new Long(lowBits, highBits).toNumber());
2905         }
2906         else if (elementType === BSON_DATA_BOOLEAN) {
2907             if (buffer[index] !== 0 && buffer[index] !== 1)
2908                 throw new BSONError('illegal boolean type value');
2909             value = buffer[index++] === 1;
2910         }
2911         else if (elementType === BSON_DATA_OBJECT) {
2912             const _index = index;
2913             const objectSize = NumberUtils.getInt32LE(buffer, index);
2914             if (objectSize <= 0 || objectSize > buffer.length - index)
2915                 throw new BSONError('bad embedded document length in bson');
2916             if (raw) {
2917                 value = buffer.slice(index, index + objectSize);
2918             }
2919             else {
2920                 let objectOptions = options;
2921                 if (!globalUTFValidation) {
2922                     objectOptions = { ...options, validation: { utf8: shouldValidateKey } };
2923                 }
2924                 value = deserializeObject(buffer, _index, objectOptions, false);
2925             }
2926             index = index + objectSize;
2927         }
2928         else if (elementType === BSON_DATA_ARRAY) {
2929             const _index = index;
2930             const objectSize = NumberUtils.getInt32LE(buffer, index);
2931             let arrayOptions = options;
2932             const stopIndex = index + objectSize;
2933             if (fieldsAsRaw && fieldsAsRaw[name]) {
2934                 arrayOptions = { ...options, raw: true };
2935             }
2936             if (!globalUTFValidation) {
2937                 arrayOptions = { ...arrayOptions, validation: { utf8: shouldValidateKey } };
2938             }
2939             value = deserializeObject(buffer, _index, arrayOptions, true);
2940             index = index + objectSize;
2941             if (buffer[index - 1] !== 0)
2942                 throw new BSONError('invalid array terminator byte');
2943             if (index !== stopIndex)
2944                 throw new BSONError('corrupted array bson');
2945         }
2946         else if (elementType === BSON_DATA_UNDEFINED) {
2947             value = undefined;
2948         }
2949         else if (elementType === BSON_DATA_NULL) {
2950             value = null;
2951         }
2952         else if (elementType === BSON_DATA_LONG) {
2953             if (useBigInt64) {
2954                 value = NumberUtils.getBigInt64LE(buffer, index);
2955                 index += 8;
2956             }
2957             else {
2958                 const lowBits = NumberUtils.getInt32LE(buffer, index);
2959                 const highBits = NumberUtils.getInt32LE(buffer, index + 4);
2960                 index += 8;
2961                 const long = new Long(lowBits, highBits);
2962                 if (promoteLongs && promoteValues === true) {
2963                     value =
2964                         long.lessThanOrEqual(JS_INT_MAX_LONG) && long.greaterThanOrEqual(JS_INT_MIN_LONG)
2965                             ? long.toNumber()
2966                             : long;
2967                 }
2968                 else {
2969                     value = long;
2970                 }
2971             }
2972         }
2973         else if (elementType === BSON_DATA_DECIMAL128) {
2974             const bytes = ByteUtils.allocateUnsafe(16);
2975             for (let i = 0; i < 16; i++)
2976                 bytes[i] = buffer[index + i];
2977             index = index + 16;
2978             value = new Decimal128(bytes);
2979         }
2980         else if (elementType === BSON_DATA_BINARY) {
2981             let binarySize = NumberUtils.getInt32LE(buffer, index);
2982             index += 4;
2983             const totalBinarySize = binarySize;
2984             const subType = buffer[index++];
2985             if (binarySize < 0)
2986                 throw new BSONError('Negative binary type element size found');
2987             if (binarySize > buffer.byteLength)
2988                 throw new BSONError('Binary type size larger than document size');
2989             if (buffer['slice'] != null) {
2990                 if (subType === Binary.SUBTYPE_BYTE_ARRAY) {
2991                     binarySize = NumberUtils.getInt32LE(buffer, index);
2992                     index += 4;
2993                     if (binarySize < 0)
2994                         throw new BSONError('Negative binary type element size found for subtype 0x02');
2995                     if (binarySize > totalBinarySize - 4)
2996                         throw new BSONError('Binary type with subtype 0x02 contains too long binary size');
2997                     if (binarySize < totalBinarySize - 4)
2998                         throw new BSONError('Binary type with subtype 0x02 contains too short binary size');
2999                 }
3000                 if (promoteBuffers && promoteValues) {
3001                     value = ByteUtils.toLocalBufferType(buffer.slice(index, index + binarySize));
3002                 }
3003                 else {
3004                     value = new Binary(buffer.slice(index, index + binarySize), subType);
3005                     if (subType === BSON_BINARY_SUBTYPE_UUID_NEW && UUID.isValid(value)) {
3006                         value = value.toUUID();
3007                     }
3008                 }
3009             }
3010             else {
3011                 if (subType === Binary.SUBTYPE_BYTE_ARRAY) {
3012                     binarySize = NumberUtils.getInt32LE(buffer, index);
3013                     index += 4;
3014                     if (binarySize < 0)
3015                         throw new BSONError('Negative binary type element size found for subtype 0x02');
3016                     if (binarySize > totalBinarySize - 4)
3017                         throw new BSONError('Binary type with subtype 0x02 contains too long binary size');
3018                     if (binarySize < totalBinarySize - 4)
3019                         throw new BSONError('Binary type with subtype 0x02 contains too short binary size');
3020                 }
3021                 if (promoteBuffers && promoteValues) {
3022                     value = ByteUtils.allocateUnsafe(binarySize);
3023                     for (i = 0; i < binarySize; i++) {
3024                         value[i] = buffer[index + i];
3025                     }
3026                 }
3027                 else {
3028                     value = new Binary(buffer.slice(index, index + binarySize), subType);
3029                     if (subType === BSON_BINARY_SUBTYPE_UUID_NEW && UUID.isValid(value)) {
3030                         value = value.toUUID();
3031                     }
3032                 }
3033             }
3034             index = index + binarySize;
3035         }
3036         else if (elementType === BSON_DATA_REGEXP && bsonRegExp === false) {
3037             i = index;
3038             while (buffer[i] !== 0x00 && i < buffer.length) {
3039                 i++;
3040             }
3041             if (i >= buffer.length)
3042                 throw new BSONError('Bad BSON Document: illegal CString');
3043             const source = ByteUtils.toUTF8(buffer, index, i, false);
3044             index = i + 1;
3045             i = index;
3046             while (buffer[i] !== 0x00 && i < buffer.length) {
3047                 i++;
3048             }
3049             if (i >= buffer.length)
3050                 throw new BSONError('Bad BSON Document: illegal CString');
3051             const regExpOptions = ByteUtils.toUTF8(buffer, index, i, false);
3052             index = i + 1;
3053             const optionsArray = new Array(regExpOptions.length);
3054             for (i = 0; i < regExpOptions.length; i++) {
3055                 switch (regExpOptions[i]) {
3056                     case 'm':
3057                         optionsArray[i] = 'm';
3058                         break;
3059                     case 's':
3060                         optionsArray[i] = 'g';
3061                         break;
3062                     case 'i':
3063                         optionsArray[i] = 'i';
3064                         break;
3065                 }
3066             }
3067             value = new RegExp(source, optionsArray.join(''));
3068         }
3069         else if (elementType === BSON_DATA_REGEXP && bsonRegExp === true) {
3070             i = index;
3071             while (buffer[i] !== 0x00 && i < buffer.length) {
3072                 i++;
3073             }
3074             if (i >= buffer.length)
3075                 throw new BSONError('Bad BSON Document: illegal CString');
3076             const source = ByteUtils.toUTF8(buffer, index, i, false);
3077             index = i + 1;
3078             i = index;
3079             while (buffer[i] !== 0x00 && i < buffer.length) {
3080                 i++;
3081             }
3082             if (i >= buffer.length)
3083                 throw new BSONError('Bad BSON Document: illegal CString');
3084             const regExpOptions = ByteUtils.toUTF8(buffer, index, i, false);
3085             index = i + 1;
3086             value = new BSONRegExp(source, regExpOptions);
3087         }
3088         else if (elementType === BSON_DATA_SYMBOL) {
3089             const stringSize = NumberUtils.getInt32LE(buffer, index);
3090             index += 4;
3091             if (stringSize <= 0 ||
3092                 stringSize > buffer.length - index ||
3093                 buffer[index + stringSize - 1] !== 0) {
3094                 throw new BSONError('bad string length in bson');
3095             }
3096             const symbol = ByteUtils.toUTF8(buffer, index, index + stringSize - 1, shouldValidateKey);
3097             value = promoteValues ? symbol : new BSONSymbol(symbol);
3098             index = index + stringSize;
3099         }
3100         else if (elementType === BSON_DATA_TIMESTAMP) {
3101             value = new Timestamp({
3102                 i: NumberUtils.getUint32LE(buffer, index),
3103                 t: NumberUtils.getUint32LE(buffer, index + 4)
3104             });
3105             index += 8;
3106         }
3107         else if (elementType === BSON_DATA_MIN_KEY) {
3108             value = new MinKey();
3109         }
3110         else if (elementType === BSON_DATA_MAX_KEY) {
3111             value = new MaxKey();
3112         }
3113         else if (elementType === BSON_DATA_CODE) {
3114             const stringSize = NumberUtils.getInt32LE(buffer, index);
3115             index += 4;
3116             if (stringSize <= 0 ||
3117                 stringSize > buffer.length - index ||
3118                 buffer[index + stringSize - 1] !== 0) {
3119                 throw new BSONError('bad string length in bson');
3120             }
3121             const functionString = ByteUtils.toUTF8(buffer, index, index + stringSize - 1, shouldValidateKey);
3122             value = new Code(functionString);
3123             index = index + stringSize;
3124         }
3125         else if (elementType === BSON_DATA_CODE_W_SCOPE) {
3126             const totalSize = NumberUtils.getInt32LE(buffer, index);
3127             index += 4;
3128             if (totalSize < 4 + 4 + 4 + 1) {
3129                 throw new BSONError('code_w_scope total size shorter minimum expected length');
3130             }
3131             const stringSize = NumberUtils.getInt32LE(buffer, index);
3132             index += 4;
3133             if (stringSize <= 0 ||
3134                 stringSize > buffer.length - index ||
3135                 buffer[index + stringSize - 1] !== 0) {
3136                 throw new BSONError('bad string length in bson');
3137             }
3138             const functionString = ByteUtils.toUTF8(buffer, index, index + stringSize - 1, shouldValidateKey);
3139             index = index + stringSize;
3140             const _index = index;
3141             const objectSize = NumberUtils.getInt32LE(buffer, index);
3142             const scopeObject = deserializeObject(buffer, _index, options, false);
3143             index = index + objectSize;
3144             if (totalSize < 4 + 4 + objectSize + stringSize) {
3145                 throw new BSONError('code_w_scope total size is too short, truncating scope');
3146             }
3147             if (totalSize > 4 + 4 + objectSize + stringSize) {
3148                 throw new BSONError('code_w_scope total size is too long, clips outer document');
3149             }
3150             value = new Code(functionString, scopeObject);
3151         }
3152         else if (elementType === BSON_DATA_DBPOINTER) {
3153             const stringSize = NumberUtils.getInt32LE(buffer, index);
3154             index += 4;
3155             if (stringSize <= 0 ||
3156                 stringSize > buffer.length - index ||
3157                 buffer[index + stringSize - 1] !== 0)
3158                 throw new BSONError('bad string length in bson');
3159             if (validation != null && validation.utf8) {
3160                 if (!validateUtf8(buffer, index, index + stringSize - 1)) {
3161                     throw new BSONError('Invalid UTF-8 string in BSON document');
3162                 }
3163             }
3164             const namespace = ByteUtils.toUTF8(buffer, index, index + stringSize - 1, false);
3165             index = index + stringSize;
3166             const oidBuffer = ByteUtils.allocateUnsafe(12);
3167             for (let i = 0; i < 12; i++)
3168                 oidBuffer[i] = buffer[index + i];
3169             const oid = new ObjectId(oidBuffer);
3170             index = index + 12;
3171             value = new DBRef(namespace, oid);
3172         }
3173         else {
3174             throw new BSONError(`Detected unknown BSON type ${elementType.toString(16)} for fieldname "${name}"`);
3175         }
3176         if (name === '__proto__') {
3177             Object.defineProperty(object, name, {
3178                 value,
3179                 writable: true,
3180                 enumerable: true,
3181                 configurable: true
3182             });
3183         }
3184         else {
3185             object[name] = value;
3186         }
3187     }
3188     if (size !== index - startIndex) {
3189         if (isArray)
3190             throw new BSONError('corrupt array bson');
3191         throw new BSONError('corrupt object bson');
3192     }
3193     if (!isPossibleDBRef)
3194         return object;
3195     if (isDBRefLike(object)) {
3196         const copy = Object.assign({}, object);
3197         delete copy.$ref;
3198         delete copy.$id;
3199         delete copy.$db;
3200         return new DBRef(object.$ref, object.$id, object.$db, copy);
3201     }
3202     return object;
3203 }

3207 function serializeString(buffer, key, value, index) {
3208     buffer[index++] = BSON_DATA_STRING;
3209     const numberOfWrittenBytes = ByteUtils.encodeUTF8Into(buffer, key, index);
3210     index = index + numberOfWrittenBytes + 1;
3211     buffer[index - 1] = 0;
3212     const size = ByteUtils.encodeUTF8Into(buffer, value, index + 4);
3213     NumberUtils.setInt32LE(buffer, index, size + 1);
3214     index = index + 4 + size;
3215     buffer[index++] = 0;
3216     return index;

3218 function serializeNumber(buffer, key, value, index) {
3219     const isNegativeZero = Object.is(value, -0);
3220     const type = !isNegativeZero &&
3221         Number.isSafeInteger(value) &&
3222         value <= BSON_INT32_MAX &&
3223         value >= BSON_INT32_MIN
3224         ? BSON_DATA_INT
3225         : BSON_DATA_NUMBER;
3226     buffer[index++] = type;
3227     const numberOfWrittenBytes = ByteUtils.encodeUTF8Into(buffer, key, index);
3228     index = index + numberOfWrittenBytes;
3229     buffer[index++] = 0x00;
3230     if (type === BSON_DATA_INT) {
3231         index += NumberUtils.setInt32LE(buffer, index, value);
3232     }
3233     else {
3234         index += NumberUtils.setFloat64LE(buffer, index, value);
3235     }
3236     return index;
3237 }

3348 function serializeObject(buffer, key, value, index, checkKeys, depth, serializeFunctions, ignoreUndefined, path) {

3358     path.delete(value);

3411 function serializeCode(buffer, key, value, index, checkKeys = false, depth = 0, serializeFunctions = false, ignoreUndefined = true, path) {
3412     if (value.scope && typeof value.scope === 'object') {

3421         NumberUtils.setInt32LE(buffer, index, codeSize);
3422         buffer[index + 4 + codeSize - 1] = 0;

3425         index = endIndex - 1;

3443 function serializeBinary(buffer, key, value, index) {

3498 function serializeInto(buffer, object, checkKeys, startingIndex, depth, serializeFunctions, ignoreUndefined, path) {
3499     if (path == null) {
3500         if (object == null) {
3501             buffer[0] = 0x05;
3502             buffer[1] = 0x00;
3503             buffer[2] = 0x00;
3504             buffer[3] = 0x00;
3505             buffer[4] = 0x00;
3506             return 5;
3507         }
3508         if (Array.isArray(object)) {
3509             throw new BSONError('serialize does not support an array as the root input');
3510         }
3511         if (typeof object !== 'object') {
3512             throw new BSONError('serialize does not support non-object as the root input');
3513         }
3514         else if ('_bsontype' in object && typeof object._bsontype === 'string') {
3515             throw new BSONError(`BSON types cannot be serialized as a document`);
3516         }
3517         else if (isDate(object) ||
3518             isRegExp(object) ||
3519             isUint8Array(object) ||
3520             isAnyArrayBuffer(object)) {
3521             throw new BSONError(`date, regexp, typedarray, and arraybuffer cannot be BSON documents`);
3522         }
3523         path = new Set();
3524     }
3525     path.add(object);
3526     let index = startingIndex + 4;
3527     if (Array.isArray(object)) {
3528         for (let i = 0; i < object.length; i++) {
3529             const key = `${i}`;
3530             let value = object[i];
3531             if (typeof value?.toBSON === 'function') {
3532                 value = value.toBSON();
3533             }
3534             if (typeof value === 'string') {
3535                 index = serializeString(buffer, key, value, index);
3536             }
3537             else if (typeof value === 'number') {
3538                 index = serializeNumber(buffer, key, value, index);
3539             }
3540             else if (typeof value === 'bigint') {
3541                 index = serializeBigInt(buffer, key, value, index);
3542             }
3543             else if (typeof value === 'boolean') {
3544                 index = serializeBoolean(buffer, key, value, index);
3545             }
3546             else if (value instanceof Date || isDate(value)) {
3547                 index = serializeDate(buffer, key, value, index);
3548             }
3549             else if (value === undefined) {
3550                 index = serializeNull(buffer, key, value, index);
3551             }
3552             else if (value === null) {
3553                 index = serializeNull(buffer, key, value, index);
3554             }
3555             else if (isUint8Array(value)) {

3817 function isBSONType(value) {
3818     return (value != null &&
3819         typeof value === 'object' &&
3820         '_bsontype' in value &&
3821         typeof value._bsontype === 'string');

3823 const keysToCodecs = {
3824     $oid: ObjectId,
3825     $binary: Binary,
3826     $uuid: Binary,
3827     $symbol: BSONSymbol,
3828     $numberInt: Int32,
3829     $numberDecimal: Decimal128,
3830     $numberDouble: Double,
3831     $numberLong: Long,
3832     $minKey: MinKey,
3833     $maxKey: MaxKey,
3834     $regex: BSONRegExp,
3835     $regularExpression: BSONRegExp,
3836     $timestamp: Timestamp
3837 };
3838 function deserializeValue(value, options = {}) {
3839     if (typeof value === 'number') {
3840         const in32BitRange = value <= BSON_INT32_MAX && value >= BSON_INT32_MIN;
3841         const in64BitRange = value <= BSON_INT64_MAX && value >= BSON_INT64_MIN;
3842         if (options.relaxed || options.legacy) {
3843             return value;
3844         }
3845         if (Number.isInteger(value) && !Object.is(value, -0)) {
3846             if (in32BitRange) {
3847                 return new Int32(value);
3848             }
3849             if (in64BitRange) {
3850                 if (options.useBigInt64) {
3851                     return BigInt(value);
3852                 }
3853                 return Long.fromNumber(value);
3854             }
3855         }
3856         return new Double(value);
3857     }
3858     if (value == null || typeof value !== 'object')
3859         return value;
3860     if (value.$undefined)
3861         return null;
3862     const keys = Object.keys(value).filter(k => k.startsWith('$') && value[k] != null);
3863     for (let i = 0; i < keys.length; i++) {
3864         const c = keysToCodecs[keys[i]];
3865         if (c)
3866             return c.fromExtendedJSON(value, options);
3867     }
3868     if (value.$date != null) {
3869         const d = value.$date;
3870         const date = new Date();
3871         if (options.legacy) {
3872             if (typeof d === 'number')
3873                 date.setTime(d);
3874             else if (typeof d === 'string')
3875                 date.setTime(Date.parse(d));
3876             else if (typeof d === 'bigint')
3877                 date.setTime(Number(d));
3878             else
3879                 throw new BSONRuntimeError(`Unrecognized type for EJSON date: ${typeof d}`);
3880         }
3881         else {
3882             if (typeof d === 'string')
3883                 date.setTime(Date.parse(d));
3884             else if (Long.isLong(d))
3885                 date.setTime(d.toNumber());
3886             else if (typeof d === 'number' && options.relaxed)
3887                 date.setTime(d);
3888             else if (typeof d === 'bigint')
3889                 date.setTime(Number(d));
3890             else
3891                 throw new BSONRuntimeError(`Unrecognized type for EJSON date: ${typeof d}`);
3892         }
3893         return date;
3894     }
3895     if (value.$code != null) {
3896         const copy = Object.assign({}, value);
3897         if (value.$scope) {
3898             copy.$scope = deserializeValue(value.$scope);
3899         }
3900         return Code.fromExtendedJSON(value);
3901     }
3902     if (isDBRefLike(value) || value.$dbPointer) {
3903         const v = value.$ref ? value : value.$dbPointer;
3904         if (v instanceof DBRef)
3905             return v;
3906         const dollarKeys = Object.keys(v).filter(k => k.startsWith('$'));
3907         let valid = true;
3908         dollarKeys.forEach(k => {
3909             if (['$ref', '$id', '$db'].indexOf(k) === -1)
3910                 valid = false;
3911         });
3912         if (valid)
3913             return DBRef.fromExtendedJSON(v);
3914     }
3915     return value;
3916 }
3917 function serializeArray(array, options) {
3918     return array.map((v, index) => {
3919         options.seenObjects.push({ propertyName: `index ${index}`, obj: null });
3920         try {
3921             return serializeValue(v, options);
3922         }
3923         finally {
3924             options.seenObjects.pop();
3925         }
3926     });
3927 }
3928 function getISOString(date) {
3929     const isoStr = date.toISOString();
3930     return date.getUTCMilliseconds() !== 0 ? isoStr : isoStr.slice(0, -5) + 'Z';
3931 }
3932 function serializeValue(value, options) {
3933     if (value instanceof Map || isMap(value)) {
3934         const obj = Object.create(null);
3935         for (const [k, v] of value) {
3936             if (typeof k !== 'string') {
3937                 throw new BSONError('Can only serialize maps with string keys');
3938             }
3939             obj[k] = v;
3940         }
3941         return serializeValue(obj, options);
3942     }
3943     if ((typeof value === 'object' || typeof value === 'function') && value !== null) {
3944         const index = options.seenObjects.findIndex(entry => entry.obj === value);
3945         if (index !== -1) {
3946             const props = options.seenObjects.map(entry => entry.propertyName);
3947             const leadingPart = props
3948                 .slice(0, index)
3949                 .map(prop => `${prop} -> `)
3950                 .join('');
3951             const alreadySeen = props[index];
3952             const circularPart = ' -> ' +
3953                 props
3954                     .slice(index + 1, props.length - 1)
3955                     .map(prop => `${prop} -> `)
3956                     .join('');
3957             const current = props[props.length - 1];
3958             const leadingSpace = ' '.repeat(leadingPart.length + alreadySeen.length / 2);
3959             const dashes = '-'.repeat(circularPart.length + (alreadySeen.length + current.length) / 2 - 1);
3960             throw new BSONError('Converting circular structure to EJSON:\n' +
3961                 `    ${leadingPart}${alreadySeen}${circularPart}${current}\n` +
3962                 `    ${leadingSpace}\\${dashes}/`);
3963         }
3964         options.seenObjects[options.seenObjects.length - 1].obj = value;
3965     }
3966     if (Array.isArray(value))
3967         return serializeArray(value, options);
3968     if (value === undefined)
3969         return null;
3970     if (value instanceof Date || isDate(value)) {
3971         const dateNum = value.getTime(), inRange = dateNum > -1 && dateNum < 253402318800000;
3972         if (options.legacy) {
3973             return options.relaxed && inRange
3974                 ? { $date: value.getTime() }
3975                 : { $date: getISOString(value) };
3976         }
3977         return options.relaxed && inRange
3978             ? { $date: getISOString(value) }
3979             : { $date: { $numberLong: value.getTime().toString() } };
3980     }
3981     if (typeof value === 'number' && (!options.relaxed || !isFinite(value))) {
3982         if (Number.isInteger(value) && !Object.is(value, -0)) {
3983             if (value >= BSON_INT32_MIN && value <= BSON_INT32_MAX) {
3984                 return { $numberInt: value.toString() };
3985             }
3986             if (value >= BSON_INT64_MIN && value <= BSON_INT64_MAX) {
3987                 return { $numberLong: value.toString() };
3988             }
3989         }
3990         return { $numberDouble: Object.is(value, -0) ? '-0.0' : value.toString() };
3991     }
3992     if (typeof value === 'bigint') {
3993         if (!options.relaxed) {
3994             return { $numberLong: BigInt.asIntN(64, value).toString() };
3995         }
3996         return Number(BigInt.asIntN(64, value));
3997     }
3998     if (value instanceof RegExp || isRegExp(value)) {
3999         let flags = value.flags;
4000         if (flags === undefined) {
4001             const match = value.toString().match(/[gimuy]*$/);
4002             if (match) {
4003                 flags = match[0];
4004             }
4005         }
4006         const rx = new BSONRegExp(value.source, flags);
4007         return rx.toExtendedJSON(options);
4008     }
4009     if (value != null && typeof value === 'object')
4010         return serializeDocument(value, options);
4011     return value;
4012 }
4013 const BSON_TYPE_MAPPINGS = {
4014     Binary: (o) => new Binary(o.value(), o.sub_type),
4015     Code: (o) => new Code(o.code, o.scope),
4016     DBRef: (o) => new DBRef(o.collection || o.namespace, o.oid, o.db, o.fields),
4017     Decimal128: (o) => new Decimal128(o.bytes),
4018     Double: (o) => new Double(o.value),
4019     Int32: (o) => new Int32(o.value),
4020     Long: (o) => Long.fromBits(o.low != null ? o.low : o.low_, o.low != null ? o.high : o.high_, o.low != null ? o.unsigned : o.unsigned_),
4021     MaxKey: () => new MaxKey(),
4022     MinKey: () => new MinKey(),
4023     ObjectId: (o) => new ObjectId(o),
4024     BSONRegExp: (o) => new BSONRegExp(o.pattern, o.options),
4025     BSONSymbol: (o) => new BSONSymbol(o.value),
4026     Timestamp: (o) => Timestamp.fromBits(o.low, o.high)
4027 };
4028 function serializeDocument(doc, options) {
4029     if (doc == null || typeof doc !== 'object')
4030         throw new BSONError('not an object instance');
4031     const bsontype = doc._bsontype;
4032     if (typeof bsontype === 'undefined') {
4033         const _doc = {};
4034         for (const name of Object.keys(doc)) {
4035             options.seenObjects.push({ propertyName: name, obj: null });
4036             try {
4037                 const value = serializeValue(doc[name], options);
4038                 if (name === '__proto__') {
4039                     Object.defineProperty(_doc, name, {
4040                         value,
4041                         writable: true,
4042                         enumerable: true,
4043                         configurable: true
4044                     });
4045                 }
4046                 else {
4047                     _doc[name] = value;
4048                 }
4049             }
4050             finally {
4051                 options.seenObjects.pop();
4052             }
4053         }
4054         return _doc;
4055     }
4056     else if (doc != null &&
4057         typeof doc === 'object' &&
4058         typeof doc._bsontype === 'string' &&
4059         doc[Symbol.for('@@mdb.bson.version')] !== BSON_MAJOR_VERSION) {
4060         throw new BSONVersionError();
4061     }
4062     else if (isBSONType(doc)) {
4063         let outDoc = doc;
4064         if (typeof outDoc.toExtendedJSON !== 'function') {
4065             const mapper = BSON_TYPE_MAPPINGS[doc._bsontype];
4066             if (!mapper) {
4067                 throw new BSONError('Unrecognized or invalid _bsontype: ' + doc._bsontype);
4068             }
4069             outDoc = mapper(outDoc);
4070         }
4071         if (bsontype === 'Code' && outDoc.scope) {
4072             outDoc = new Code(outDoc.code, serializeValue(outDoc.scope, options));
4073         }
4074         else if (bsontype === 'DBRef' && outDoc.oid) {
4075             outDoc = new DBRef(serializeValue(outDoc.collection, options), serializeValue(outDoc.oid, options), serializeValue(outDoc.db, options), serializeValue(outDoc.fields, options));
4076         }
4077         return outDoc.toExtendedJSON(options);
4078     }
4079     else {
4080         throw new BSONError('_bsontype must be a string, but was: ' + typeof bsontype);
4081     }
4082 }
4083 function parse(text, options) {
4084     const ejsonOptions = {
4085         useBigInt64: options?.useBigInt64 ?? false,
4086         relaxed: options?.relaxed ?? true,
4087         legacy: options?.legacy ?? false
4088     };
4089     return JSON.parse(text, (key, value) => {
4090         if (key.indexOf('\x00') !== -1) {
4091             throw new BSONError(`BSON Document field names cannot contain null bytes, found: ${JSON.stringify(key)}`);
4092         }
4093         return deserializeValue(value, ejsonOptions);
4094     });
4095 }
4096 function stringify(value, replacer, space, options) {
4097     if (space != null && typeof space === 'object') {
4098         options = space;
4099         space = 0;
4100     }
4101     if (replacer != null && typeof replacer === 'object' && !Array.isArray(replacer)) {
4102         options = replacer;
4103         replacer = undefined;
4104         space = 0;
4105     }
4106     const serializeOptions = Object.assign({ relaxed: true, legacy: false }, options, {
4107         seenObjects: [{ propertyName: '(root)', obj: null }]
4108     });
4109     const doc = serializeValue(value, serializeOptions);
4110     return JSON.stringify(doc, replacer, space);
4111 }
4112 function EJSONserialize(value, options) {
4113     options = options || {};
4114     return JSON.parse(stringify(value, options));
4115 }
4116 function EJSONdeserialize(ejson, options) {
4117     options = options || {};
4118     return parse(JSON.stringify(ejson), options);
4119 }

4127 function getSize(source, offset) {
4128     if (source[offset + 3] > 127) {
4129         throw new BSONOffsetError('BSON size cannot be negative', offset);
4130     }
4131     return (source[offset] |
4132         (source[offset + 1] << 8) |
4133         (source[offset + 2] << 16) |
4134         (source[offset + 3] << 24));
4135 }
4136 function findNull(bytes, offset) {
4137     let nullTerminatorOffset = offset;
4138     for (; bytes[nullTerminatorOffset] !== 0x00; nullTerminatorOffset++)
4139         ;
4140     if (nullTerminatorOffset === bytes.length - 1) {
4141         throw new BSONOffsetError('Null terminator not found', offset);
4142     }
4143     return nullTerminatorOffset;
4144 }
4145 function parseToElements(bytes, startOffset = 0) {
4146     if (bytes.length < 5) {
4147         throw new BSONOffsetError(`Input must be at least 5 bytes, got ${bytes.length} bytes`, startOffset);
4148     }
4149     const documentSize = getSize(bytes, startOffset);
4150     if (documentSize > bytes.length - startOffset) {
4151         throw new BSONOffsetError(`Parsed documentSize (${documentSize} bytes) does not match input length (${bytes.length} bytes)`, startOffset);
4152     }
4153     if (bytes[startOffset + documentSize - 1] !== 0x00) {
4154         throw new BSONOffsetError('BSON documents must end in 0x00', startOffset + documentSize);
4155     }
4156     const elements = [];
4157     let offset = startOffset + 4;
4158     while (offset <= documentSize + startOffset) {
4159         const type = bytes[offset];
4160         offset += 1;
4161         if (type === 0) {
4162             if (offset - startOffset !== documentSize) {
4163                 throw new BSONOffsetError(`Invalid 0x00 type byte`, offset);
4164             }
4165             break;
4166         }
4167         const nameOffset = offset;
4168         const nameLength = findNull(bytes, offset) - nameOffset;
4169         offset += nameLength + 1;
4170         let length;
4171         if (type === 1 || type === 18 || type === 9 || type === 17) {
4172             length = 8;
4173         }
4174         else if (type === 16) {
4175             length = 4;
4176         }
4177         else if (type === 7) {
4178             length = 12;
4179         }
4180         else if (type === 19) {
4181             length = 16;
4182         }
4183         else if (type === 8) {
4184             length = 1;
4185         }
4186         else if (type === 10 || type === 6 || type === 127 || type === 255) {
4187             length = 0;
4188         }
4189         else if (type === 11) {
4190             length = findNull(bytes, findNull(bytes, offset) + 1) + 1 - offset;
4191         }
4192         else if (type === 3 || type === 4 || type === 15) {
4193             length = getSize(bytes, offset);
4194         }
4195         else if (type === 2 ||
4196             type === 5 ||
4197             type === 12 ||
4198             type === 13 ||
4199             type === 14) {
4200             length = getSize(bytes, offset) + 4;
4201             if (type === 5) {
4202                 length += 1;
4203             }
4204             if (type === 12) {
4205                 length += 12;
4206             }
4207         }
4208         else {
4209             throw new BSONOffsetError(`Invalid 0x${type.toString(16).padStart(2, '0')} type byte`, offset);
4210         }
4211         if (length > documentSize) {
4212             throw new BSONOffsetError('value reports length larger than document', offset);
4213         }
4214         elements.push([type, nameOffset, nameLength, offset, length]);
4215         offset += length;
4216     }
4217     return elements;
4218 }

4222 onDemand.BSONOffsetError = BSONOffsetError;
4223 Object.freeze(onDemand);

4225 const MAXSIZE = 1024 * 1024 * 17;
4226 let buffer = ByteUtils.allocate(MAXSIZE);
4227 function setInternalBufferSize(size) {
4228     if (buffer.length < size) {
4229         buffer = ByteUtils.allocate(size);
4230     }
4231 }
4232 function serialize(object, options = {}) {
4233     const checkKeys = typeof options.checkKeys === 'boolean' ? options.checkKeys : false;
4234     const serializeFunctions = typeof options.serializeFunctions === 'boolean' ? options.serializeFunctions : false;
4235     const ignoreUndefined = typeof options.ignoreUndefined === 'boolean' ? options.ignoreUndefined : true;
4236     const minInternalBufferSize = typeof options.minInternalBufferSize === 'number' ? options.minInternalBufferSize : MAXSIZE;
4237     if (buffer.length < minInternalBufferSize) {
4238         buffer = ByteUtils.allocate(minInternalBufferSize);
4239     }
4240     const serializationIndex = serializeInto(buffer, object, checkKeys, 0, 0, serializeFunctions, ignoreUndefined, null);
4241     const finishedBuffer = ByteUtils.allocateUnsafe(serializationIndex);
4242     finishedBuffer.set(buffer.subarray(0, serializationIndex), 0);
4243     return finishedBuffer;
4244 }
4245 function serializeWithBufferAndIndex(object, finalBuffer, options = {}) {
4246     const checkKeys = typeof options.checkKeys === 'boolean' ? options.checkKeys : false;
4247     const serializeFunctions = typeof options.serializeFunctions === 'boolean' ? options.serializeFunctions : false;
4248     const ignoreUndefined = typeof options.ignoreUndefined === 'boolean' ? options.ignoreUndefined : true;
4249     const startIndex = typeof options.index === 'number' ? options.index : 0;
4250     const serializationIndex = serializeInto(buffer, object, checkKeys, 0, 0, serializeFunctions, ignoreUndefined, null);
4251     finalBuffer.set(buffer.subarray(0, serializationIndex), startIndex);
4252     return startIndex + serializationIndex - 1;
4253 }
4254 function deserialize(buffer, options = {}) {
4255     return internalDeserialize(ByteUtils.toLocalBufferType(buffer), options);
4256 }
4257 function calculateObjectSize(object, options = {}) {
4258     options = options || {};
4259     const serializeFunctions = typeof options.serializeFunctions === 'boolean' ? options.serializeFunctions : false;
4260     const ignoreUndefined = typeof options.ignoreUndefined === 'boolean' ? options.ignoreUndefined : true;
4261     return internalCalculateObjectSize(object, serializeFunctions, ignoreUndefined);
4262 }
4263 function deserializeStream(data, startIndex, numberOfDocuments, documents, docStartIndex, options) {
4264     const internalOptions = Object.assign({ allowObjectSmallerThanBufferSize: true, index: 0 }, options);
4265     const bufferData = ByteUtils.toLocalBufferType(data);
4266     let index = startIndex;
4267     for (let i = 0; i < numberOfDocuments; i++) {
4268         const size = NumberUtils.getInt32LE(bufferData, index);
4269         internalOptions.index = index;
4270         documents[docStartIndex + i] = internalDeserialize(bufferData, internalOptions);
4271         index = index + size;
4272     }
4273     return index;
4274 }
